loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo, tiene 59 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, cortes. Toda su vida ha sido agricultor, cultiva maíz, frijol, yuca y plátano. Donde realiza los cultivos es un terreno comunal, la producción la vende en el mercado local del municipio. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de insumos como fertilizantes y abonos para dar mejor asistencia a sus cultivos. Su meta es seguir trabajando para poder hacer su casa en un terreno propio que tiene ya que donde vive es de un familiar.
texts.en: Eduardo is 59 years old and married. He has two children and lives in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. He has been a farmer for his whole life; he grows corn, beans, cassava, and bananas. He plants his crops in communal land and sells his produce at the local market. The loan he is requesting is for 7,000 HNL and he will invest it in the purchase of supplies, such as fertilizer and compost, in order to give his crops better care. His goal is to continue working in order to build his house on some land he has as he is currently living with relatives.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as fertilizer and compost, to better care for his crops

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra dreams of working in business administration, but she knows it may never be possible without a degree. Alejandra was accepted into a degree program, and now with the chance to achieve her dream, is concerned about financing her education. She plans on graduating in June 2016, but without a loan from Vittana, she thinks that she may need to take time off to work and save until she can return to school. 

With this loan, Alejandra plans on purchasing her much-needed textbooks and school supplies. With the proper books, Alejandra feels she will be able to study more effectively and earn better grades. With a career in business administration, she expects to earn $13 a day. 

Alejandra's parents were never able to complete their primary education. For her family of 14, finances have always been stretched thin. With 11 older siblings, Alejandra is unsure how she will be able to afford her school books on her own without the assistance of a Vittana loan. Alejandra's father's salary from his job as a mason is the family's primary source of income.

loans.use: to pay for textbooks.

loans.name: Manrique Danilo

texts.es: Manrique de 27 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 4 años, 6 años y 9 años de edad. ÉL es un joven comprometido quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Manrique se dedica al comercio de ropa nueva para niño. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad y gracias a los buenos productos y precios que ofrece muchas personas la prefieren. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la venta y de esta forma mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Con el monto solicitado comprará pantalones, camisas, trajes, camisetas, etc.
texts.en: 27-year-old Manrique lives in his own house with his wife and his three children, who are aged four, six, and nine years. He is a committed young man who does everything in his power to give his family better living conditions. Manrique makes a living by selling new children’s clothes. He sells them on the streets of the main areas of his neighbourhood and many people prefer his business for the good products and prices he offers. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to invest it in the purchase of merchandise to sell, in this way improving his sales and his earnings. With the requested amount he will purchase pants, shirts, suits, t-shirts, etc.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, suits, t-shirts, etc

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin dreams of becoming a systems engineer, but he knows that without a degree it may never be possible. To achieve his goal, Edwin has enrolled in the Universidad Domingo Savio. He plans on graduating in December 2014, but without a loan from Vittana, he fears that he will need to defer his graduation. 

With this loan, Edwin plans to purchase his much-needed textbooks and school supplies. With the proper books, Edwin feels he will be able to study more effectively and earn better grades. 

With a degree in systems engineering, he expects to earn $15 a day. As the youngest of three, with one older sibling attending college already, Edwin is unsure how he will be able to finance his education on his own without the assistance of a Vittana loan.

loans.use: to pay for his school books.

loans.name: Ersilda Ivette

texts.es: Ersilda de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace 13 años. Ella es una joven muy trabajadora, comprometida y dedicada quien trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. Todos los días trabaja como empleada de una institución cercana a su localidad y en su tiempo libre se dedica a atender su negocio de tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su lugar de residencia. De esta forma se gana la vida y apoya a su querida familia con la economía del hogar. Desea invertir en la compra de mercadería de tienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar mayor inventario como: golosinas, sopas, macarrones, papel de baño, detergente, etc.
texts.en: Ersilda is 26 years old, living with her family in their own home for the past 13 years. She is a very hard working young woman, committed and dedicated to working hard to get her family ahead. Every day she works as an employee for an institution close to her home. She dedicates her free time to tending to her store, which she established through great effort and runs out of her home. In this way she makes a living and supports her dear family's household expenses. She requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her store. She will buy inventory in bulk such as: sodas, soups, pastas, toilet paper and detergent.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, soups, pasta, toilet paper, detergent and other items.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, es casado, tiene dos hijas las cuales están estudiando, junto a sus padres aprendió a la crianza de pollos es por eso que hoy en día se dedica a administrar su granja de pollos, lo hace todos los días, como una forma de generar las ganancias con las cuales cubre los gastos de su hogar.
El capital lo invertirá en la compra de concentrado y pollos, de esta manera tendrá fortalecido el negocio y podrá cumplir con la de manda de sus clientes, espera tener un  negocio muy competitivo para mejorar la economía familiar.
Sueña con cambiar el estilo de vida de su familia y mantener su negocio activo.
texts.en:
José is married and has two children who attend school.  He learned to raise chickens from his parents and currently makes a living running a chicken farm.  He works every day to generate the earnings to cover the household expenses.

José will invest the capital in concentrated feed and chickens to strengthen his business and meet customer demand.  He hopes to have a more competitive business to improve the family finances.

José dreams of changing his family's lifestyle and of keeping his business running.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and chickens

loans.name: Evarista

texts.es: Doña Evarista, tiene 53 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortés con su conyugue y sus hijos. Tiene 4 años de tener un salón de belleza como su propio negocio, presta servicios de tintes, cortes de pelo, alisados, planchados, manicure, pedicure y otros. El negocio lo tiene en su casa y lo ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios prestamos. Actualmente solicita otro por 21,000 Lempiras para comprar productos de belleza como tintes, champú, cremas, esmaltes, tratamientos para cabello, etc. Su sueño es lograr que su negocio sea auto sostenible.
texts.en: Evarista is 53 years old. She lives in the municipality of Choloma, Cortés, with her partner and her children. For the past four years she has operated a beauty salon as her own business. She provides services such as hair coloring, haircuts, straightening, hair ironing, manicures, pedicures and others. She runs the business in her home, and she has maintained it by investing with various loans. Currently, she is requesting another one for 21,000 Lempiras, to buy beauty products such as hair dyes, shampoo, creams, nail polish, hair treatments, etc. Her dream is to reach the point where her business is self-sustaining.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for her business such as hair dyes, shampoo, creams, nail polish, hair treatments, etc.

loans.name: 01.13.01 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Vui operates a food stall/restaurant where she sells rice and noodles. She has been in business for five years.  

Vui is requesting a loan to purchase items needed to make processed food.  One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital.

Vui is 54 years old and she is married with one children.  She is the group leader of the 01.13.01 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which includes three members. 

Vui lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.  This will be Vui's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  

Vui hopes to use her profit from her business loan to improve the health and happiness of her family and she hopes to help her children find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase items needed to make processed food.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia de 45 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 21 años y 10 años de edad. Lidia se gana la vida mediante la elaboración y venta de yuca salcochada y yuca frita. La venta la realiza en su casa de habitación desde hace mucho tiempo y gracias a su carisma y deliciosa yuca que ofrece muchas personas la prefieren cada día más. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para ampliar su negocio ya que desea icursionar en el mercado de calzado, además del negocio de yuca. Con el monto solicitado comprará yuca al por mayor y zapatos para dama.
texts.en: Lidia ia 45 years old and a single mother. She lives in her own house together with her children, who are 21 and 10. Lidia earns her living by preparing and selling boiled and fried yuca. She has sold this product out of the house where she lives for a long time. Thanks to her charisma and the delicious yuca she offers, she attracts more customers each day. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to expand her business, since she would like to enter the market for shoes in addition to her yuca business. With the funds she is requesting, she will buy yuca on a wholesale basis as well as women's shoes.

loans.use: to buy yuca on a wholesale basis and women's shoes to sell.

loans.name: Mahdi

texts.en: Mahdi is 27 years old and married with one child. They live in their own house in a rural area. Before one year ago, Mahdi and his partner opened a business for renting cars. Mahdi was working as a taxi driver and has good experience in the car servicing field. He has applied for this youth loan to renew the registration of the cars. Mahdi has a lot of customers who prefer to use his cars service since he drives attentively and very carefully. He hops that this business increases his income and he will be able to give his children good conditions for life and meet their needs.

loans.use: to renew the registration of the cars.

loans.name: J Leonidas

texts.es: Don Leonidas, tiene 51 años de edad, esta soltero, vive con sus dos hijos en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos, hace 10 años aumento su producción de maíz y frijol y la vende en el mercado local. Cuenta con su propia parcela de terreno para cultivar. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, con el propósito de mejorar la producción y ventas. Su plan es ampliar el cultivo, mejorar la cosecha y sus ganancias para darle calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Leonidas is 51 years old and single. He lives with his two children in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. He has always worked in agriculture growing staple crops. Ten years ago, he increased his production of corn and beans, and he sells them at the local market. He has his own plot of land to cultivate. The loan he is requesting is for 15,000 Lempiras, to buy fertilizers for his corn and bean crops, in order to improve his production and sales. His plan is to expand his fields and improve his harvest and his earnings, in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to nourish his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.es:
La Sra. Pamela es una mujer muy trabajadora vive en un departamento en anticretico en la zona de Bella Vista ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.  Se dedica principalmente a la atencion de ventas en una empresa de fotocopiadoras, trabajo muy responsablemente. El esposo se separo hace ya mas de un año la dejo con un hijo. Ella va a su trabajo en la zona de central  de la ciudad desde las 9:00 de la manana hasta las 7 de la noche; Pamela necesita el credito para hacer refacciones al departamento que ella habita (arreglo en el baño y en un deormitorio) y asi poder tener mejor comodidad tanto para ella y su hijo de 2 años.

El sueño de Pamela poder tener mayores ingresos en base al sacrificio que hace,  y poder tener una vejez tranquila, espera  contar con un salario de vejez que le permita vivir mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Pamela is a very hard-working woman. She lives in an apartment under an "anticretico" [antichresis] arrangement, in the Bella Vista area of the city of La Paz.  She principally works as a salesperson for a photocopier business, and she is a very responsible worker. Her husband separated from her more than a year ago, leaving her with one child. She goes to work in the downtown area of the city from 9:00 in the morning to 7 in the evening. Pamela needs a loan to carry out repairs to the apartment where she lives (fixing up the bathroom and one bedroom). Thus she will be able to have greater comfort for herself and her 2-year-old son. 

Pamela's dream is to achieve a higher income based on the sacrifices she makes, and to be able to have a peaceful retirement. She hopes to receive a retirement pension which will allow her to live with an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to repair her bathroom and one bedroom.

loans.name: Jully Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es jully, cuyo sueño es ayudar es poder brindar una ayuda a la comunidad y por que no avances científicos por medio de sus habilidades y conocimientos, pero ella tiene un impedimento para avanzar a gran escala, su impedimento es el recurso económico. 
Vive con su mama, hermano menor, abuela y dos tíos, donde solo su mama es quien responde por ellos con tan solo un mínimo autorizado en su país.
A su corta edad tiene grandes aspiraciones y la lucha por los sueños comenzó en diciembre cuando una llamada entro a su teléfono ofreciendo un programa educativo que seria el primer escalón a el sueño.
Actualmente estudia auxiliar de enfermería, la formación con las ciencias de la salud la ha impulsado a no bajar la guardia frente a la situación económica y a si terminar los primeros estudios, pero para la mala suerte, el convenio con el que la financiaron para el estudios se dio por terminado y sin el no podría continuar por mas que la inspiración y motivación la impulsen, por eso hoy a querido vincularse a la gran oportunidad de ser parte  del convenio con kiva, seria esta la solución para poder tener una base educativa y en la sociedad avanzando, para dentro de unos años brindar esa ayuda que tanto desea brindar a la familia que la ha apoyado y a la comunidad que necesita de gente dispuesta a luchar por ellos mismos y por quienes lo rodean.
texts.en:
This is Jully, whose dream is to be able to help the community. Through her ability and knowledge she is making progress in science, but her lack of economic resources is an impediment that prevents her from advancing to a higher level. 

She lives with her mother, younger brother, grandmother, and two uncles; her mother has sole responsibility for them, with only the minimum allowable in her country.  

At her young age, she has great aspirations, and her fight for her dreams began in December when she received a phone call, offering an educational program that would become the first step toward her dream.

She is currently studying to be a nursing assistant, and the health sciences training program has motivated her to not give in to her economic situation, and to complete the first level of her studies.  But as bad luck would have it, the partnership through which she was financed was terminated, and without it she could not continue, however much inspiration and motivation drove her.  That is why she wants to take the great opportunity to be part of the Kiva partnership today.

It would be the solution that would enable her to have an educational foundation and to progress in society.  This way, within a few years she will be able to give her family, who has supported her, the help that she wants so much to give them, and she will be able to help the community, which needs people who want to fight for themselves and for those around them.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Alma Sixtina

texts.es:
Alma es una joven de 30 años de edad graduada de bachiller en ciencias y letras, casada con el que hasta hoy en día es su esposo el cual es agricultor madre de 2 hijos la mayor tiene 10 años de edad quien el próximo año va a quinto grado en la escuela de la comunidad. En compañía de su esposo trabajan la agricultura involucrándose únicamente ellos 2 que además ella trabaja como maestra voluntaria en el kínder de su comunidad el cual está frente a su casa, ahora tienen otra niña la cual tiene tres meses de nacida y viven al lado de la casa de sus padres. Su ingreso económico depende del cultivo de café rubro al que se dedica desde hace 5 años aprendiendo de sus padres y en compañía de su esposo. Además de que ella había tenido una inducción en el colegio sobre el cultivo de café lo cual le pareció muy importante y lo ha estado poniendo en práctica ya en lo propio y junto a su esposo por lo cual ella puede realizar todas las tareas concernientes al cultivo del café. El terreno que trabajan es propio el cual lo adquirieron gracias a una herencia y la otra parte fueron una compra por lo que agradecen a Dios por ser tierras productoras de café ubicadas a 10 minutos de su casa de habitación a la cual se dirigen en moto o carro. Ella últimamente no se ha involucrado mucho en el cuidado y mantenimiento por el embarazo y cuidado de su hija menor.
Sus metas, planes y sueños mantener sus cultivos de café en excelentes condiciones, comprar más tierra para cultivarlo de café en una mejor variedad y de esa manera asegurar y darle un nivel de vida a su familia mucho mejor sobre todo sus hijas quienes quisiera que se prepararan con una carrera universitaria y que encuentren un buen trabajo para que tengan otros ingresos. 
Por lo que hoy en día ha solicitado financiamiento el cual invertirá en podar una parte de su plantación que esta vieja para que retoñe plata nueva, abonar, foliar y pagar mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a la misma.
texts.en:
Alma is a young woman, 30 years old, graduated from high school in science and letters. She is married with he who, today, is her husband, who is a farmer. She is a mother of two children, the eldest is 10 and, next year will go to fifth grade in the community school. With the company of her husband they farm, involving only themselves. In addition, she works as a volunteer teacher in the kindergarten of her community, which is in front of her house. Right now, they have another daughter who is three months old and they live next to the house of her parents. Her economic income depends on the coffee plants, work that she has been doing for the past five years, learning from her parents and in the company of her husband.

Also, she has participated in the school about coffee cultivation, which was seemed very important to her and she has been putting it to practice already by itself and alongside her husband. Therefore, she can carry out all of the tasks concerned with coffee cultivation. The land that they work is their own, which they acquired thanks to inheritance. The other part was purchased for which they thank God for being lands which produce coffee. They are located 10 minutes from their house, to which they drive in a motorcycle or car. Lately, she has not been involved much in the care and maintenance because of the pregnancy and care of her youngest daughter.

Her goals, plans and dreams are to maintain her coffee plants in excellent conditions and buy more land to grow coffee in a better variety. In this manner, she will assure and give a much better level of life to her family, above all her daughters, whom she wishes to prepare with a university career and wishes that they find good work so that they have other income.

Because of this, these days she has applied for financing, which she will invest in pruning a part of her crop that is old so that she can get more money, fertilize, foliate and pay labor to give maintenance to said crop.

loans.use: for assistance and purchase of agricultural supplies for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Nueva Vision Group

texts.es: Maria Isabel 40 años es casada y tiene 02 hijos el mayor de 21 años y el ultimo de 14. Junto su esposo trabajan para brindarles a sus hijos estabilidad económica. María Isabel es secretaria del grupo “NUEVA VISIÓN” conformado por 06 socios. Ella es docente  de profesión, tiene una librería negocio que empezó porque ella era consumidora de ese tipo artículos, el negocio esta ubicado en su domicilio donde trabaja aproximadamente 07 horas diarias, su negocio ofrece toda clase de materiales de librería y oficina, por otro lado también dicta clases particulares generándole otros ingresos. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá mejorar su negocio y comprar artículos de librería. En el futuro le gustaría que su negocio siga creciendo. El grupo esta agradecido por este préstamo a los inversionistas que lo hacen posible, Maria Isabel es la segunda de la izquierda (sentada)viste polo blanco.
texts.en: Maria Isabel is 40 years old and has two children: the eldest is 21 years old and the younger one is 14. Together with her husband, she works to provide economic stability for her children. María Isabel is the secretary of the “NUEVA VISIÓN” ["New Vision"] group, which is composed of 6 members. She is a teacher by profession, and she has a bookstore business which she started because she was a consumer of this type of goods. The business is located in her home, where she works approximately 7 hours per day. Her business offers every type of paper goods and office supplies. She also gives private classes, which generate additional income for her. With the loan she is requesting, she will be able to improve her business and buy bookstore supplies. In the future, she would like to see her business keep growing. The group is grateful for this loan and the investors who make it possible. Maria Isabel is the second from the left (seated) in a white shirt.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her bookstore.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, solicita un crédito nuevo para la siembra de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), sus labores inician a las 6:00 a.m., en está ocasión pagara la mano de obra para la recolección de la cosecha, es un oficio que heredo de su familia y lo ayudan sus hijos. La tienda que poseía antes ya no está activa, sin embargo la venta de electrodomésticos de forma ambulante si lo sigue realizando.
El préstamo anterior en su momento le ayudo a surtir la tienda, lo que le sirvió para tener mejores ganancias y pudo cancelar la deuda adquirida.
texts.en:
Luis is requesting another loan for growing basic grains (corn and beans).  He starts work at 6 a.m.

This time Luis will pay laborers to harvest the crop.  It's a line of work he learned from his family, and his children help him.  The store he used to have is no longer in business, but he's still selling appliances as a street vendor.

The previous loan helped him stock his store at the time.  This helped him have better earnings, and he was able to pay back his debt.

loans.use: to pay laborers to harvest the crop

loans.name: Montaña Camapara Group

texts.es:
Don Natividad, tiene 54 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea de Gracias, Lempira. El cultiva café, vende el grano en uva en la misma zona y también cultiva maíz y frijoles. Toda su vida ha sido agricultor siendo su única fuente de ingresos para el sustento familiar. Solicita un préstamo por 4,000 Lempiras en forma grupal para comprar 8 bolsas de fertilizantes para sus cultivos y sacar mejor producción y ganancias. Su plan es seguir cultivando café para obtener ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y darles estudio a sus hijos. 
El Grupo se llama Montaña Camapara,esta integrado por 7 miembros, que se dedican al cultivo de café, maíz y frijol y viven en la misma comunidad. El préstamo que solicitan es de 23,000 lempiras y lo invertirán en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para dar asistencia a los cultivos. En la foto se identifican asi: a la izquierda esta Serbando, seguido esta Don Natividad, Antonio, José, Ismael, María y María Suyapa a la derecha.
texts.en:
Natividad is 54 years old, married, and has four children. He lives in a village in Gracias, Lempira. He grows coffee, and sells the coffee cherries in the same area. He also grows corn and beans.

Natividad has been a farmer his whole life, and this is his only source of income to support his family. He is requesting a loan of 4,000 lempiras as part of his group, in order to buy eight bags of fertilizers for his crops, and improve his production and profits. His plan is to continue growing coffee in order to earn an income, increase his quality of life, and provide his children with an education.

The group is called Montaña Campara and is composed of seven members. The members work growing coffee, corn and beans, and live in the same community. They are requesting a loan of 23,000 lempiras and will invest it the purchase of manure and fertilizers to help the growth of their crops. In the photo, the members are as follows: Serbando is on the left, followed by Natividad, Antonio, José, Ismael, María, and María Suyapa on the right.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to help grow his crops.

loans.name: Segundo Noe

texts.es:
Segundo vive en el distrito de San juan de Lurigancho, cada día trabaja en su pequeño negocio de elaboración y venta de bolsas, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder llevar un sustento para su familia, sobre todo porque es padre de 2 hijos de 8 y 5 años a los cuales quiere mucho.

Segundo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar herramientas para poder realizar su trabajo como una pequeña remalladora, sellador, entre otros, así podrá seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y poder tener otro negocio”.
texts.en:
Segundo lives in the San Juan de Lurigancho district.  He works every day in his small business making and selling bags, which enables him to support his family.  He's the father of two children, ages 8 and 5, and he loves them very much.

Segundo's grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to buy tools to do his job, including a small darner and sealant.

This way he'll be able to continue working and striving to achieve his big dream of giving his children a profession and being able to have another business.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Ana Amparo

texts.es:
Ana, se dispone a surtir la tienda para estar preparada y responder a la demanda de sus clientes en estas fechas de fiestas navideñas, comprara arroz, frijol, bebidas, aderezos, aceite, golosinas, entre otros.
Con el capital anterior Ana fortaleció su negocio con productos nuevos y a buen precio lo que le dio la oportunidad de atraer nuevos clientes y tener más ganancias con las que cancelo sus cuotas y mejoro la economía familiar.
texts.en:
Ana plans to stock her store so she'll be ready for customer demand during this Christmas season.  She's going to buy rice, beans, beverages, seasonings, oil, sweets, and other things.

With the previous loan Ana strengthened her business with new products at good prices.  She attracted new customers and earned more profits with which she made her payments and improved the family finances.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, beverages, seasoning, oil, sweets, and other products

loans.name: Denis Leonardo

texts.es:
Denis es un joven emprendedor de 26 años de edad, logro estudiar hasta bachillerato; pero las circunstancias económicas en las que se encontraba no le permitieron entrar a la universidad. 
Con ellos vive también la mamá de Denis, ella les ayuda en la tortillería y en los oficios del hogar.
Él se dedica a  realizar trabajos con la serigrafía, desde hace 5 años y desde hace dos años al corte y confección de ropa. Está casado y junto con su esposa tienen una tortillería, desde hace 5 años, en este negocio ya cuentan con una considerable clientela y con mucha oportunidad de seguir creciendo. Esta actividad les ha permitido llevar el sustento a la familia. Todas esta actividades, las desarrolla en el lugar donde vive, de lunes a sábado.
En este momento están viviendo en una casa que es alquilada, el sueño de Denis, es tener su propio terreno y construir su casa ahí. En este momento le venden un terreno a un precio bastante cómodo, pero solo cuenta con una parte del dinero, esto es el ahorro en varios años de trabajo, le hace falta una parte del dinero, por lo tanto necesita el préstamo para completar este restante.
Además de tener un lugar propio donde construir su casa, tiene como meta también: ingresar a la universidad  y poder sacar una carrera como profesional.
texts.en:
Denis, 26, is a young entrepreneur.  He was able to finish his college prep program but his financial circumstances didn't allow him to go to college.

Denis has done silk-screen printing for five years and tailoring for two years.

He's married and he and his wife have had a tortilla business for five years.  Their business has a considerable number of customers and a lot of opportunities for continuing to grow.  This job has allowed him to support his family.

Denis carries out all these activities from Monday through Saturday in his home.  His mother lives with them as well, helping with the tortilla business and the household chores.

Currently they're living in a rented house.  Denis's dream is to have his own plot of land and build his house there.  Currently there's some land available at an affordable price.  He only has part of the money, though--his savings from several years of work.  He needs the loan so he'll have the rest of the money.

In addition to having a place of his own to build a house, he also wants to go to college and be able to have a professional career.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to build his house

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. El trabajo por varios años en una empresa privada y al quedar sin empleo decidió por su propio negocio y estableció  una llantera, donde repara y vende llantas rines y neumáticos. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ha solicitado el séptimo préstamo actualmente que es por 25,000 Lempiras y los invertirá en la compra de llantas, neumáticos y rines para vender, con el propósito de incrementar las ventas e ingresos. Su meta es mejorar el nivel económico y de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 35, lives in a common-law relationship with his partner, with whom he has two children.  He lives in a community in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.

He worked for a private company for several years and decided to start his own business when he was out of work.  He set up a tire shop where he repairs and sells tires, rims, and pneumatic tires.  His business is in his house.

Juan has requested his seventh loan; this one is for 25,000 lempiras [HNL].  He's going to buy tires, pneumatic tires, and rims to sell, so he can increase his sales and his income.  His goal is to improve his family's financial status and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy tires and rims

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Doña Hilda de 53 años de edad curso hasta sexto grado es madre de 8 hijos quienes cuatro viven con ella una de las mayores tiene 24 años y está en la universidad, el segundo tiene 21 años llego hasta sexto grado y se dedica a la agricultora junto a su padre, la tercera tiene 18 años y curso la secundaria completa, y la última tiene 16 años y está cursando el segundo curso de la secundaria ya que con ella también viven dos nietos uno de 18 años y uno de 15 y está cursando el segundo años de secundaria. Ella se dedica al cultivo de café con una experiencia de 45 años decidiendo dedicarse a este rubro ya que es el único medio de ingreso para su hogar y su familia por generaciones. Su plantación de café está ubicada a una distancia de 10 minutos en vehículo al cual se trasladan en familia para asistir. Su producto es comercializado en una comunidad cercana. Doña Hilda también tiene un molino de moler maíz siendo el único en la comunidad y por medio de este también genera ingresos en el hogar.
Sus metas y sueños comprar más terrenos para sembrar y cultivar una mejor variedad de producto que sea más resistente a la roya y que sus hijos y nietos que dependen de ella estudien para que sean profesionales.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas para abonar y darle mantenimiento en general a la plantación de café ya que esto evitara que se le deteriore su producto.
texts.en:
Doña Hilda, who is 53 years old, went to school through the sixth grade. She is the mother of eight children, of whom four live with her. The oldest [of these four] is 24 and is at the university. The second is 21; he went to school through the sixth grade, and he works in agriculture with his father. The third is 18 and completed secondary school, and the last one is 16 and is in the second year of secondary school. Two grandchildren also live with her. One is 18 years old, and one is 15 and is in the second year of secondary school. 

She grows coffee, with 45 years of experience doing this work, since it has been the only means of income for her household and her family for generations. Her coffee plantation is located at a distance of 10 minutes by vehicle;  they travel there as a family to work. Her product is sold in a nearby community. Doña Hilda also has a mill for grinding corn; it is the only one in the community, and because of this, it also generates income for her household.

Her goals and dreams are to buy more land to plant, to grow a better variety of product that is more resistant to rust, and to have her children and grandchildren who depend on her study to have careers.

For these reasons, she has now applied to the COMIXMUL cooperative for financing, with which she will buy agricultural supplies to fertilize and provide general maintenance to her coffee plantation, since this will prevent her product from deteriorating.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her coffee plantings

loans.name: Hijos De Grau Group

texts.es: “HIJOS DE GRAU” es una alcancía conformada por 06 socias. Maria de 43 años es una de las integrantes, ella es casada y tiene 03 hijos pequeños. Ella es nueva dentro del grupo, al que ingreso invitada por una amiga. El negocio al que se dedica es la venta de productos de belleza empezó este negocio animada por su hermana quien se dedica a lo mismo, esta agradecida porque le va bien en su negocio y cuenta con muchos clientes sus principales compradores son sus vecinos, amigos y familiares. Con el préstamo solicitado quiere incursionar en la venta de ropa para eso utilizara el integro del dinero, espera tener éxito y así poder extender su negocio, el sueño que tiene para el futuro es abrir una jugueria. María quiere agradecer a los inversionistas KIVA por este préstamo que es muy importante para ella y su grupo, en la foto es la tercera esta de pie y viste polo negro y short jean, la foto adjunta pertenece a Angel el único socio varón.
texts.en: "Hijos de Grau" is a group made up of 6 members. Maria, 43 years old, is one of the members, and is married with three small children. She is new to the group after being invited to join by a friend. Her business is in the sale of beauty products and she started this business with the encouragement of her sister who works in the same field.  She is grateful because her business is going well and she has many customers, of whom her main customers are neighbours, friends and family. With the loan she has requested, she wants to use the money to start selling used clothing. She hopes to be successful and so extend her business. Her dream for the future is to open a juice & smoothie bar. Maria would like to thank the investors in this Kiva loan which is very important for her and her group. In the photos she is the third person standing, wearing a black polo-shirt and short jeans. The attached photo belongs to Angel, the only male partner in the group.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Karina es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque es madre de un pequeño de 8 años al cual saca adelante con mucho esfuerzo, Karina con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de comida de la selva, ella cree que le va bien porque tiene  muy buena sazón y sobre todo es muy amable con sus clientes.
Karina esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar utensilios de cocina como cucharones  ollas, cubiertos, entre otros, de esta manera podrá mejorar la atención a sus clientes y poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener un gran restaurante”.
texts.en:
Karina is a very hardworking woman, especially because she is the mother of an 8 year old child, which requires a lot of effort. With a great deal of determination, Karina has succeeded in setting up her business selling food of the rainforest. She believes that she it is going well because it has a very nice flavour and she is very friendly with her customers.
Karina is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to this she will be able to buy kitchen utensils such as ladles for pots, cutlery etc. and so will be able to improve the service to her customers and be able to realise her dream of "having a large restaurant"

loans.use: to buy kitchen implements and utensils

loans.name: Alejandrino

texts.es:
Alejandrino es un hombre trabajador de 64 años de edad, casado y padre de 6 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo.
Durante su vida productiva siempre se ha desempeñado como comerciante independiente, inicialmente tenía un almacén de venta de mercancía y ropa, pero un tiempo después decidió cambiar de actividad y montó una tienda de abarrotes, ubicada en el barrio donde reside, donde ya es reconocido por su trayectoria de 12 años, por su amabilidad y la calidad en el servicio y en los productos que ofrece.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de surtido de víveres al por mayor (granos, carnes frías, lácteos, entre otros) así podrá tener más variedad de inventario disponible para satisfacer las necesidades y diversos gustos de su clientela, lo que le dará la posibilidad de mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe.
Alejandrino manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir luchando por sus sueños, especialmente el de ampliar su negocio y convertirlo en un autoservicio, en el que los clientes tengan a la mano todos los artículos o productos que requieran y así poder mejorar la rentabilidad a mediano plazo; así tendrá la oportunidad de da r a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar, además pretende disfrutar una vejez tranquila al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Alejandrino is a hardworking 64-year-old man. He is married and the father of six children, whom he has helped to get ahead with great effort. During his working life, he has always gotten by as an independent merchant. Initially, he had a store where he sold merchandise and clothes, but some time later he decided to change activities and opened a grocery store. It is located in the neighbourhood where he lives, where he is known for having had the store for 12 years, for his friendliness, and for the quality of his service and of the products he sells.

With the aim of strengthening his business, Alejandrino is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of a stock of bulk supplies (grains, cold meats, and dairy products, among other items). In this way he'll be able to have a greater variety of inventory available to satisfy the needs and diverse tastes of his customers. This will give him the opportunity to improve his sales and the earnings he takes in.

Alejandrino says that his age won't keep him from continuing to fight for his dreams, especially his dream of expanding his business and converting it into a minimart, where his customers will have access to all of the items and products that they need. This will improve Alejandrino's medium-term profitability. This way, he will have the opportunity to give his family a better quality of life and well-being. Alejandrino seeks to enjoy a peaceful old age alongside his wife.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of bulk supplies (grains, cold cuts, and dairy products, among other items)

loans.name: Daniel Antonio

texts.es:
Daniel, es casado, vive junto a su esposa y su hijo de dos años de edad, de sus padres aprendió llevar a cabo la siembra de granos básicos y la ganadería, desde hace 10 años lo hace de forma independiente, de esta manera obtiene los ingresos necesarios para los gastos familiares.
El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, semilla y una novilla, lo que le fortalecerá el negocio y le dará la posibilidad de incrementar sus ganancias con las cuales podrá ir cancelando sus cuotas y los gastos familiares.
Aspira a tener a tener un negocio más amplio y dar un estilo de vida diferente a su familia.
texts.en:
Daniel is married. He lives with his wife and their two-year-old son. From his parents he learned to carry out the planting of basic grains and the raising of livestock. For 10 years he has been doing this independently. In this way he obtains the necessary income for the family expenses. 

He will invest the loan in the purchase of compost, fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, and a heifer, which will strengthen his business and give him the possibility of increasing his earnings, with which he will be able to pay his bills and the family expenses.

He aspires to have a broader business and give a different way of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, and a herifer

loans.name: Chanthorn

texts.en:
Chanthorn, 50, lives in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Koh Sotin district, Cambodia. She is widowed with eight children. To make a living, she has been growing tobacco for 30 years. To make more income, she also works for others for a fee. She earns about USD 7 per day from her current business.

Chanthorn is a first-cycle client with VisionFund. Now, she is asking for an education loan. She is going to use this loan to pay for her son to study Civil Engineering. She hopes that this loan will enable her to keep her son in the university until graduation and help to relieve her family's financial burden so she can sustain and grow her business.

loans.use: to pay for her son to study Civil Engineering.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José de 78 años de edad, está casado y su esposa realiza los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos, ninguno vive con él,  ya se acompañaron solo él vive con su esposa.

Se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de bovino desde hace unos tres años, lo aprendió de su padre que hacía lo mismo. Antes el cliente era soldado en la guardia,  en el cual trabajo mucho tiempo. El cliente cuida sus vacas desde que las ordeña a las 4:00 AM hasta que las trae a las 2:00 PM, en el transcurso del día José trabaja ya que no tiene más familiares que le apoyen. 

El préstamo será utilizado,  para comprar una vaca parida, la cual sea buena para la producción de leche.

José, ya no tiene hijos a cargo, pero asegura que los nietos le están exigiendo como si él fuera el padre,  por lo que él quiere tener muchos bovinos,  para poder dejarles de herencia a ellos y que puedan trabajar honradamente como comerciantes.
texts.en:
José, 78 years old, is married and his wife performs the household chores. He has two children although none live with him since they are partnered. He only lives together with his wife.
He works in agriculture and has raised cattle for the past three years, which he learned from his father who did the same. Before, the client was a soldier in the guards where he worked for a long time. The client cares for his cows from the milking at 4:00AM up until 2:00PM. Throughout the course of the working day José has no family members to help him. 
The loan will be used to buy a cow that has recently calved, which is good for milk production.
José has no dependent children, but notes that his grandchildren are just as demanding and see him as if he were their father. Therefore he wants to have many cattle, so that he can leave an inheritance to them and so they can work honourably as traders.

loans.use: to buy a cow that has recently calved

loans.name: Bokk Jom Santhié Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit Bokk Jom Santhie est constitué de 2 femmes qui s’activent dans le commerce depuis des années. La présidente, la dame Michelle, est un habitué du guichet de par ses crédits, mais aussi par sa participation à l’organisation interne de la mutuelle. Madame Michelle s’active dans le commerce de produits cosmétiques, mais aussi dans la couture. Elle possède une cantine au marché du quartier depuis plus de trois ans et travaille de 8h30mn à 19h ou même jusqu’à 20h dès fois. Avec le crédit, va acheter des produits cosmétiques pour mettre dans sa cantine et revendre. Sa participation consiste à régler les besoins de ses enfants : tout ce dont ils ont besoin, elle essaie de les satisfaire.
Michelle rêve d’acquérir sa propre maison et de développer son activité.
texts.en: The loan group Bokk Jom Santhie is made up of 2 women who have been active in business for years. The president, the lady Michelle, is an office regular because of her loans, but also because of her participation in the internal cooperative. Madame Michelle got started in the cosmetic products business, but also in sewing. She has owned a stand at the district market for more than three years and works from 8:30 a.m. to 7 p.m. or even until 8 p.m. sometimes. With the loan, she is going to buy cosmetic products to put in her stand and resell. Her participation consists of settling the needs of her children: any needs they have, she tries to meet. Michelle dreams of acquiring her own house and developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products to resell.

loans.name: Yet

texts.en:
Aged 29 years, Yet is married and lives with her family in a rural area located in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She has two children; one is too young for school while the other one is in school. She earns a living through farming rice and growing rubber trees. Having been in this business for eight years, she is able to earn about KHR 28,000 per day to support her family.

This is the second loan for Yet with VisionFund. She has used the first loan wisely and successfully to improve her family’s livelihood. Now she is applying for a loan of 2,200,000 KHR to buy fertilizer for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend on labor costs. This loan will enable her to extend her farmland so as to increase her rice farming production to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Phat

texts.en:
Originally from a village of Kampong Cham province’s Ponhea Krek district, Phat is aged 48 years and married with four children. For more than 10 years, he and his wife have been farming rice and growing cassava. To add more income, he also works for others for a fee. The current business earns them about 44,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

Phat has been with VisionFund for two cycles and he wisely and successfully used the first loan to make his living conditions better. Now he is applying for another loan of KHR 2,000,000 to buy fertilizer for his cassava and use a portion of it to spend on renovating his old house. He hopes this loan will enable him to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sot's Group

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Sot is 24 years old and married. To make a living, she has been farming rice for five years. The current business earns her about 28,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

Sot has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the past loan. Now she is asking for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to pay for harvesting rice. She hopes to raise more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to pay for harvesting rice

loans.name: Amigas De Laura Caller Group

texts.es: La alcancía “AMIGAS DE LAURA CALLER” esta representada por 06 amigos y vecinos del mismo lugar. Norma de 50 años es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos adultos, ella es comerciante se dedica a la confección de cajas para diferentes usos como tortas regalos etc. Empezó este negocio debido a la necesidad de su familia, en la actualidad le va muy bien tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes que también son comerciantes de diferentes productos.Norma trabaja junto a su esposo y se siente muy feliz por todo lo que ha logrado. El préstamo solicitado lo utilizara básicamente para comprar materiales y continuar con su negocio, su sueño es seguir creciendo y convertir su negocio en una empresa. Ella en representación de su grupo comunal quieren dar gracias por este préstamo que los inversionistas de KIVA hacen posible, en la foto es la segunda de la izquierda viste polo y pantalón negro.la foto adjunta pertenece a Cesar Augusto.
texts.en: The group "Amigas de Laura Caller" is made up of 6 friends and neighbours from the same area. Norma, 50 years old, lives with her partner and has 3 grown children. She is a trader who works in the making of boxes for different uses, such as gift cakes etc. She started this business due to the needs of her family. Currently, the business is going very well and she has many orders from customers who are also traders of different products. Norma works beside her partner and she feels very happy for all that she has achieved. The loan requested will be used to buy materials and continue her business. Her dream is to keep growing and turn her business into a company. She, together with her community group, would like to give thanks for this loan that the investors at Kiva make possible. In the photo she is the second from the left, dressed in polo and black trousers. The photo attached belongs to Cesar Augusto.

loans.use: to purchase materials

loans.name: Chanthoun

texts.en:
Chanthoun is 28 years old. She is married and has no children yet. She lives and works in Bakan, the most populous district in Pursat province. She runs the family business growing rice and raising some birds at home. She has been involved in agriculture for more than ten years and earns a normal income of USD 5.00 per day. The main challenge that Chanthoun faces in her business is the low crop yields caused by insects and the fluctuating prices of her products.

Chanthoun has been with HKL for a previous loan, which positively helped to improve her living conditions. She has successfully repaid the loan. This will be her second loan, which she will use to build a household latrine. The water loan program with a special rate offered by HKL has helped to encourage Chanthoun to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine.

loans.name: Maira Alexandra

texts.es:
Ella es maira alexandra, estudia auxiliar de enfermería de la institución campo alto, lo estudia es porque le gusta ayudar a la gente y que mas bello que ayudarle en todas las etapas prestando los conocimientos para una mejor salud y calidad de vida y no solo a ellos si no también a la familia, tanto económico como con los conocimientos brindarles una estabilidad económica, por ejemplo, a los abuelos ayudarlos, cuidarlos, le gusta lo que estudio porque puede ayudar al ser humano en todas las etapas, porque quiere hacer lo que le gusta.
Ella quiere seguir estudiando y ejercer su técnico y mas adelante ser enfermera profesional, para tener mas conocimiento y poder ayudar mas a su familia y a la gente que lo necesita, quiere ser una profesional y sabe que por donde va, va muy bien. Este es un gran salto para lo que quiere para ella, por esta razón pide a kiva que le ayude a financiar el sueño que es su carrera, para seguir estudiando y ejercer  lo que le gusta, ya que sus padres no cuentan con el dinero en su totalidad de las cuotas, pasa a tercer semestre y quiere continuar, gracias por la atención y colaboración que le puedan brindar.
texts.en:
Maira Alexandra is studying to be a nursing assistant at Campo Alto college. She is studying this because she likes to help people, and what could be better than to help at every stage, offering the knowledge required for better health and a better quality of life? She'd like to help not only patients but also her own family, not only economically but also to offer them better economic stability through her knowledge. For example, she'd like to help her grandparents, and care for them. She likes what she's studying because she can help human beings at every stage, and because she wants to do something that she likes. 

Maira Alexandra wants to continue studying and practicing her trade. She'd like to be a professional nurse in the future, so that she can have more knowledge and provide more help to her family and people in need. She wants to be a professional and she is progressing well. This is a big step forward toward getting what she wants. For this reason, she is asking Kiva to help her to finance her dream, which is to finish her degree, to continue studying and doing what she loves, since her parents don't have the money needed to pay her full tuition. She is going on to her third semester and wishes to continue. Thank you for your consideration and for the collaboration you can provide to Maira.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Sinoern's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Sinoern is a 37-year-old mother of four children. She has been farming rice. Having been in this business for almost 20 years, she is able to earn about 50,000 KHR per day but she can manage to save about 30,000 KHR each day after daily expenses.

Sinoern has been with VisionFund for three cycles. She completely paid back the past loans which have helped her better support her family. Now she is applying for another loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: El señor José y su esposa son personas mayores vive en una zona rural de la provincia de Tiraque y ya no tienen dependientes económicos. Su actividad económica es netamente agrícola y los principales productos que cultiva y vende son papa, haba, cebada y otros, la siembra de estos cultivos lo realiza en sus propias parcelas. El señor es una persona trabajadora y responsable, tiene muchas ganas de superarse e incrementar su producción agrícola, para tal efecto solicita un crédito para la compra de abono gallinaza, de esta forma seguirá trabajando y podrá obtener mayor producción y a traves de eso lograra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Jose and his wife are elderly people and live in a rural part of the Tiraque province.  They have no dependents.  He is a farmer and raises mainly potatoes, peas, barley, and other things and grows his crops on his own land.  He is a hardworking and responsible man with a great desire to get ahead and increase his production, so he is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and continue working to increase his production and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es: Juan de 23 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia a su grupo familiar. Juan trabaja como empleado de una empresa de seguridad desde hace 5 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el pisos y para repellar el pasamano de la vivienda.
texts.en: Juan is 23 years old, single, and lives in a home of his own with relatives.  Juan has worked for a security company for five years and earns a living and supports the household this way.  He wants to improve his living conditions and is asking for a loan, through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and gravel to install floors and to repair the railing in his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Ivan vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, trabaja como asistente contable en una pequeña empresa de su ciudad, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder solventar sus gastos de estudios, ya que se encuentra en la universidad, Ivan cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable.

Ivan agradece el apoyo que le han brindado ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar artefactos para su hogar como una pequeña cocina a gas, con lo cual podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Ivan lives in the city of Pucallpa and works as an accountant’s assistant in a small company in town, where he earns money to pay his education expenses; he studies at university.  Ivan believes that things are going well for him at his job because he is responsible because of the support he has gotten and thanks to it he can buy household articles like a small gas stove with which he will improve his quality of life and continue making his dreams a reality, “Having his own home.”

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Glady Dilenia

texts.es:
La señora Glady es una persona emprendedora,  honesta y seria, vive con su esposo y sus hijos,  en el sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la compra y venta  de sandias.
Doña Glady el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de sandias y con esto espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten al tener más mercancía que ofrecer a los clientes y cubrir las necesidades de los mismos.
Doña Glady desea poder mejorar su situación económica y que a un corto plazo siga creciendo y consolidándose para que su negocio se  convierta en el más grande y reconocido de la región y seguir apoyando a su familia y que sus hijos se conviertan en unas personas honestas con principios. 



Choluteca, Honduras  – Diciembre   del   2013
texts.en:
Glady is an enterprising, honest, and serious person.  She lives with her husband and children in southern Honduras.  She buys and sells watermelons.

Glady needs this loan to buy watermelons and hopes to increase her sales by having more merchandise to offer her customers and cover their needs.

Glady wants to improve her financial situation and continue growing in the short term, by consolidating her business so that it will grow and become better known in the region and continue supporting her family and children, so that they will become honest persons of means.

Choluteca, Honduras – December 2013

loans.use: to buy watermelons.

loans.name: Jose Trinidad

texts.es: Jose, tiene 32 años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula, tiene una pulpería desde hace 3 años, donde vende refrescos, granos básicos, churros, productos enlatados, lácteos, pan, azúcar, manteca, condimentos etc. Anteriormente trabajo en empresa privada y al no tener empleo decidió con su esposa poner un negocio, el cual lo ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios prestamos. El préstamo que solicita actualmente es por 27,000 Lempiras, el cual lo va invertir para comprar granos básicos, refrescos, pan, carne de pollo  y poder surtir y aumentar las ganancias. Su plan es poder construir su casa de material de bloques.
texts.en:
José, 32, is married and has two children.  He lives in the town of San Pedro Sula.

José has had a grocery store for three years.  He sells refreshments, basic grains, chips, canned goods, dairy products, bread, sugar, shortening, condiments, etc.  Previously he worked for a private company.  When he was out of work he and his wife decided to set up a business, which he has supported with several loans.

The loan José's currently requesting is for 27,000 lempiras [HNL].  He's going to buy basic grains, refreshments, bread, and chicken to stock his store and increase his profits.

His plan is to be able to build his house out of concrete blocks.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, refreshments, bread, and chicken

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is the age of 26, living in Lahore, with her husband and five children.

Her husband has been running a barber shop for many years. He wants to buy new instruments and furniture but his financial conditions do not allow him to buy new instruments. Due to his low purchasing power, Zahida requested a loan to empower her husband, so that he can easily buy new instruments such as scissors, combs, shaving machine, front mirror, and revolving chair.

Zahida hopes that this loan will work positively and she will be able to make some savings for household expenses. Zahida thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy instruments, mirror, and chair for her husband's barber shop.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto, tiene 24 años, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres con sus hermanos. Es mecánico y trabaja hace 2 años en una empresa de su localidad como operario. Poco a poco se está comprando sus cosas. Beneficiario utilizará el crédito para comprase un televisor. Su gran anhelo es tener su propio taller de mecánica, el cual le permita mejorar la calidad de vida su familia y en un futuro formar su propia familia.
texts.en: Roberto is 24 years old and lives with his parents and siblings.  He is a mechanic and has been working for a local company for two years.  He has been buying his things little by little and he will use the money from this loan to buy a TV.  His greatest dream is to have his own mechanics shop, which will allow him to improve his quality of life for himself and form his own family in the future.

loans.use: to buy a TV.

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: El señor Florentino vive en concubinato y tiene 2 hijos , compro un terreno urbano en el que actualmente se encuentra viviendo, su principal ingreso económico proviene de la agricultura,  se dedica a la producción de cítricos y otras frutas, actualmente no cuenta con un lote agrícola propio solo se dedica a trabajar  al partido  (del 100%  de la producción vendida solo el 50 % le pertenece y el otro 50% para el dueño del lote agrícola), ya que no tiene muchos recursos económicos solicita un crédito para la construcción de su vivienda, de esta forma su familia podrá gozar de un ambiente más cómodo y apropiado para realizar sus actividades diarias.
texts.en: Florentino lives in a common law marriage and has two children.  He bought a piece of urban land and it’s for sale.  His main income comes from farming and he raises citrus and other fruit.  He does not have his own farmland, but he works as a sharecropper (he keeps 50% of the production and the rest goes to the owner), since he doesn’t have many financial resources.  He is asking for this loan to build his house.  In this way he can have a more comfortable environment for his daily activities.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta de 40 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su compañero de vida y sus 6 hijos (22 años, 19 años, 14 años, 10 años, 8 años y 5 años de edad). Marta trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su familia puesto que por ser muy grande el ingreso de su compañero de vida no logra cubrir los gastos del hogar. Marta es muy creativa para los negocios. Gracias a que desde muy joven aprendió a hacer variedad de pan dulce ahora en día es lo que le permite ganarse el sustento y ayudar en la economía del hogar. Marta pide muy amablemente este crédito a FUSAI ya que desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para sus hijos y no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso. Con el Monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, hierro, madera y ladrillo.
texts.en: Marta is 40 years old and lives under humble conditions with her husband and six children (ages 22, 19, 14, 10, 8, and 5).  Marta works very hard to support her family because it’s very large and her husband’s income is not enough to cover her household expenses.  Marta is very creative for business.  She learned to make sweet bread when she was young and this helps her support the household finances.  Marta is asking for a loan through FUSAI so she can build a bedroom for her children.  She doesn’t have the capital she needs and will use the money from this loan to buy cement, sand, iron bars, lumber and brick.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Jose Ascencion

texts.es:
José, se decidió por otro crédito para invertir en la compra de sorbete y paletas de sabores por mayor, con las que continuara trabajando y tener más clientes satisfechos, ya que podrá cumplir con la demanda.
Con  el préstamo anterior incremento el inventario de su negocio, con lo que ha podido aumentar sus ingresos, cancelar las deudas y cambiar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en: José opted for another loan to invest in buying sorbet and wholesale flavored ice-pops which he will continue working with to have more satisfied customers, as he will be able to keep up with demand. With the previous loan, he increased his business inventory which allowed him to increase his income, cancel debts, and change his daily lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy sorbet and ice-pops

loans.name: Shagufta

texts.en:
Shagufta is a 30-year-old, married woman. She lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She has requested a loan for her husband’s fruit-selling business.

Her husband has been selling fruit for many years; he sells seasonal fresh fruits in his hometown. He uses a four-wheeled manual cart for selling. As a hawker he can easily be reached, because he is near to the people. His young children, and their needs, are growing. To cope with the rapid increase in the cost of school fees, books, utility bills and household expenses, he wants to grow his business. But he does not have enough savings to buy fruit in bulk.

Therefore, Shagufta has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy fresh and seasonal fruits to sell.

Shagufta wants to save the excess profit amount, so that she could use these savings for future sudden needs and for her children's education. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy fresh and seasonal fruits, for her husband to sell

loans.name: Martha Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela es una  persona con una gran capacidad de aprendizaje, y sed por conocimiento, su formación profesional empezó hace 5 meses con campo alto, inicia con esperanza, animo y todas las pilas puestas. El programa que ella decide estudiar viene motivada por su innata necesidad de querer ayudar a las demás personas con algo mas que buena voluntad. Ella desde pequeña es motivada con sus emociones y sensibilidad hacia las personas y la necesidad de sanar y tener una mejor vida, a si toma la decisión en el sector de la salud, contribuir y proyectarse a futuro como una gran profesional en salud, haciendo aportes importantes y que marquen referencia a donde ella vaya.
Campo alto en su programa de auxiliar de enfermería le ofrece a gabriela un pensul completo, un estándar de calidad importante y una proyección que se va aclarando en la mente a medida que ella aprende mas y mas.
Gabriela en el mes de junio obtuvo un apoyo económico, el padre orlando le da una aporte económico mensual, siendo esto, gabriela decide ser la mejor en su clase y lo logro con las grandes capacidades, entusiasmo y disciplina. Con un promedio alto y el reconocimiento no solo de los compañeros si no también de la profesora, gabriela logro metas personales, familiares y objetivos estudiantiles. En el mes de diciembre gabriela recibe la noticia de que la fundación no puede seguir apoyándola con su aporte mensual, gabriela sin desmotivarse busca soluciones, habla con campo alto y ofrece apoyo de 15% del valor de la matricula, gabriela sin dudarlo opta por acudir a esta entidad, en donde esta segura que le ira bien y responderá con excelentes resultados al apoyo brindado. Kiva es mas que una ayuda, es un respaldo al sueño de gabriela y el proyecto con una mejor calidad de vida no solo para ella si no para la familia.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a person with a great capacity for learning and thirst for knowledge. Her professional training began five months ago with CampoAlto. She's starting out with hope, encouragement and energy. 

The program she decided to study is motivated by an innate desire to help other people with something other than goodwill. 
Since childhood she has been motivated by her emotions, sensitivity, and the need to heal people to have a better life.

Thus she's made the decision to start in the health sector. She contribute and projected future as a health professional, making important contributions making references where she goes.

The nursing assistant program at CampoAlto offers Gabriela a comprehensive curriculum, a high standard and a projection that is becoming increasingly clear in her mind as she learns more and more.

In June, Gabriela obtained financial support, her father, Orlando gives her a monthly stipend, this being, Gabriela has decided to be the best in her class and achievement with great skills, enthusiasm and discipline. 
With a high GPA and recognition not only from her peers, but also from the teacher. Gabriela is achieving personal, family and student goals. 

In December Gabriela received the news that the foundation can not continue to support her with monthly contribution. Without losing motivation Gabriella is seeking solutions, after speaking with CampoAlto they will offs 15 % off of the cost of tuition. Gabriella without hesitation chose this entity, she is sure that she will do well and respond with providing excellent grades. Kiva is more than an aid, it is an endorsement of Gabriela's dream and project for a better quality of life not only for her, but for her family.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a divorced woman with three children who are adults. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. 

For over 3 years, she has operated a fruit and vegetable stall business from her home selling to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of establishing a grocery store in the future.

With the 20,000 KES she wants to purchase stock of green vegetables, fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of green vegetables, fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Abida

texts.en:
Abida is a 32-year-old married woman living in Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children.

Her husband sells rose petals and garlands in a stall at the front of a graveyard. The flower selling business is not a profitable business and their family hardly fulfills their needs. Due to cold weather, the roses lose their freshness and the stall needs maintenance as well. 

Therefore, Abida requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband would be able to buy roses in bulk to obtain petals for garlands and for the maintenance of the stall. Abida praises their cooperation. She thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy roses in bulk to obtain petals for garlands and for the maintenance of the stall.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is married with three school-going children. They live in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

Mariam has operated a business selling clothes for the past 2 years. She sells clothes in a shop to her town dwellers, passersby, and neighbors. She faces a major challenge of inflation in her business. 

With the 40,000 KES she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Isolina

texts.es:
Isolina tiene 68 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en l distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se encuentra sobre el valle de Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes, patos y gallinas desde hace 04 años, esta labor lo realiza para cubrir una parte de los gastos familiares ya que sus hijos aportan otra parte, es una madre emprendedora que ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para la compra de cuyes de raza y de esta manera mejorar su producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Isolina, 68, lives with her children in the district of Cayaltí, a community found in the Zaña valley where its residents work in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located in the Chiclayo Province in the north cost of Peru.

She has been raising and selling guinea pigs, ducks and chickens for the last four years. This work helps cover part of the family expenses as her children provide the other part. 

She is an enterprising mother that has asked for this loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy feed to fatten up her animals and to buy breeding guinea pigs. With these purchases she can improve her production to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten up animals.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards. Now, she is requesting a loan of KSHS 20,000 to purchase onions, tomatoes, vegetables and potatoes for resale .Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase onions, tomatoes, vegetables and potatoes for resale

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

She is asking for a loan to buy vegetables, fruits and potatoes for resale, which will help her to invest back into her business. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits and potatoes for resale

loans.name: Zubaida

texts.en:
Zubaida belongs to an ultra poor family and has been feeding her three children. There is only person earning an income and contributing to the household expenses. Zubaida has been saving for many days to buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband but mostly her savings are spent for household expenses. Now she wants to buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband but she does not have enough cash on hand to buy the auto rickshaw. Therefore, Zubaida requested a loan so her husband can buy a new rickshaw with the loan and her savings.  She hopes that her husband will drive the auto rickshaw with full devotion and earn sufficient income.

Zubaida is a 40-year-old married woman living with her children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is married with three school-going children. They live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Charity has operated a fruits and vegetable stall business for the past three years. She sells from home to her neighbors. She dreams of establishing a mini green grocery in the future.

With the KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase bales of green vegetables, onions, potatoes, and tomatoes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase bales of green vegetables, onions, potatoes, and tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret appreciates her previous loan that improved her living standards. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She would like to apply for a loan of KSHS 20,000 to purchase braids, weaves, hair chemicals, hair oil, shampoos and hair conditioners. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like braids, weaves, and more for her beauty salon

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
This is Jenifer. She previously accessed a loan that she used to buy charcoal. Her earnings were a big help for her personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another KSHS 50,000 loan to buy additional charcoal for resale. She looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy additional charcoal for resale

loans.name: Reyna Noemy

texts.es:
Reyna, solicita otro crédito para comprar una máquina de coser, comprando el equipo necesario para que funcione su negocio, podrá dar un buen servicio a sus clientes y sus ganancias continuaran siendo estables.
El capital anterior le ayudo a fortalecer el negocio y su economía ha mejorado, su familia tiene un estilo de vida diferente y sus hijos siguen preparándose académicamente.
texts.en:
Reyna is requesting another loan to buy a sewing machine. Purchasing the equipment she needs in order for her business to function, she will be able to provide good service to her customers and ensure that her earnings remain stable.
