She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar, and flour.

loans.name: Naseeran

texts.en:
Naseeran, aged 47, is the mother of five children; she has been doing business stitching pillows and bed sheets for the last 10 years, with the support of her husband.  She prepares sets of pillows and bed sheets and sells them in the market; she also receives orders from the people of her community. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

Currently she is in her third loan cycle, and applied for a loan of Rs. 40,000. This will help her to purchase spools of thread, fabric, and laces along with  packs of needles.  She would be able to increase her sales, and profits alongside. 

She hopes to grow her business, and dreams of improving her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase spools of thread, fabric, and laces along with packs of needles.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad, vive con esposo, sus tres hijos y su suegra en casa propia, ella es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y muy emprendedora, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  venta de ganado y también a la siembra de maíz y frijol. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos,  ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende también su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas y concentrado para el ganado, y  asi poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: She is 26 years old, lives with her husband, three children, and mother in law in their own home.  She is a hardworking, responsible, and enterprising woman and has been selling livestock for several years.  She also raises corn and beans.  She has good customers and has managed to win her customers’ trust.  She offers quality prices on her products and has decided to invest into the care of her livestock, since this is her business.  She is asking for this loan so she can buy vitamins for her livestock so she can continue providing her family with a better quality of life without limits.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed.

loans.name: Siempre Unidos Group

texts.es:
La socia Estherlin, la socia continua con el negocio de venta de comida y tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende sus productos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a sus negocios los cuales le traen satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia es una persona alegre, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería para su tienda como azúcar y leche.
La socia se siente agradecida con los inversionistas de Kiva y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de celulares, venta de ropa, tienda de abarrotes, venta de papa, venta de comida, preparación de bebidas.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
Los socios que aparecen a la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo
texts.en:
Member Estherlin is still in business selling food at her grocery store. She sells her products to the customers that come in. She has been doing this for quite some time now, and her business rewards her both financially and personally. She is a joyful person and she wants to keep working so that she can continue supporting her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her store, such as milk and sugar. She is grateful to Kiva lenders and promises to comply with her payment terms. 

The other members work selling cell phones, selling clothing, grocery store, selling potatoes, selling food, preparing drinks. The person whose face is covered does not belong to the communal bank. The members in the attached photos had persmission to arrive late to the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store, such as milk and sugar.

loans.name: Mesaidi

texts.en:
Mesaidi is a married mother of two children who go to school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

Mesaidi has operated a business selling cashew nuts at the market for the past eight years. Her main customers are passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the KES 10,000 she wants to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She is requesting a loan of KES 20,000 to purchase soft drinks, bread, wheat and sugar for resale. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, bread, wheat and sugar for resale

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is asking for a loan because she believes that through it, she will improve her business. 
The previous loan enabled her to expand her retail shop and earn more money. Due to her hard work and profits she gained from her retail shop, she managed to open another business, selling women wrap clothes (Lessos).

She is requesting a loan of KES 50,000 to purchase pieces of lessos for her business. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase pieces of lessos (women wrap clothes) for her business.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive con su hija de 10 años, para apoyar en los gastos de su casa tiene una tienda y se dedica a la crianza de ganado, sus labores las distribuye en el transcurso del día, sus labores inician a las 6:00 a.m. y finalizan a las 6:00 p.m., es un oficio que aprendió por cuenta propia.
Invertirá en la compra de arroz, frijol, aceite, golosinas y concentrado para ganado, fortalecerá su negocio y atraerá a más clientes con lo que percibirá mejores ganancias y podrá cancelar las cuotas de su crédito, así como también cubrir los gastos familiares.
Anhela darle la oportunidad de estudiar a su hija y hacerle mejoras a su tienda.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has a 10 year old daughter.  She has a store and raises livestock in order to support the household.  She works from 6:00 am to 6:00 pm and she learned this on her own.

She will buy rice, beans, cooking oil, snacks and concentrated livestock feed.  She will strengthen her business and attract more customers so she will increase her income and pay off her debt.  She will also be able to cover her family expenses.

She wants to provide her daughter with the opportunity to attend school and also make improvements to her land.

loans.use: to stock her store and buy feed.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, solicita capital para comprar cuatro tareas de caña de azúcar, las cuales molera para hacer dulce de atado, que luego venderá, el resto lo utilizara para pagar mano de obra que le ayude a recolectar la cosecha de granos básicos.
Con el préstamo anterior pudo tener los insumos agrícolas necesarios para tener una cosecha abundante con lo que sus ingresos son mejores y mejoro el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Luis is requesting a loan to buy four cords of sugar cane to grind for making "dulce de atado" [log-shaped candy] to sell.  He'll use the rest of the money to pay laborers to help him harvest basic grains.

With the previous loan Luis bought the agricultural inputs he needed to have an abundant harvest.  His income is better and he improved his family's lifestyle with the loan.

loans.use: to buy sugar cane

loans.name: Hameedan

texts.en:
Hameedan is a 46-year-old, married woman. She is the mother of five children. The income earned by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing this work for many years and has become famous for providing good-quality milk in her locality. At present, she has one cow and two buffaloes.

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Recently, she requested a loan of PKR 50,000. She will use it to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Kausar

texts.en: Kausar is a 33-year-old married woman. She appears in the photo with her husband, a driver by profession, who provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but the rickshaw now requires proper maintenance to keep it in functional. Kausar has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 for her husband to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better service to his passengers. Kausar is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle

loans.name: Abdulhakim

texts.en: Abdulhakim is a 22-year-old who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is a soldier who earns daily income. He works hard to offer a good life for his family. Most of the money he makes is spent on raising his family. His house is very old and needs a quick renovation. The house is vulnerable to collapse at any time. He knows that such a thing needs a lot of money. He has started renovating his house, but is now short of money. He needs to complete the renovation task, so he asked for a loan of 150,000 YER to buy construction supplies. He hopes that after the completion of his house renovation, he will feel safe in his house with his family.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to complete the renovation task of his house.

loans.name: Fatumata

texts.en:
Fatuma is 37 years old and married, with five children between the ages of 10 and 21 who are in school. They all live in West Point, one of the most populated and well known markets in Montserrado County, a place that is good at producing fish for the Liberian local market. 

She was unable to attend school, and has been selling palm oil, rice, charcoal, beans, okra, peppers, etc., in the local market for the past 10 years. She uses a motorbike to get her goods, so she really faces a problem during the rainy season. 

She is requesting for her second loan to increase her inventory (palm oil, rice, charcoal, beans, okra, peppers, etc.) before the rainy season. 

Her dream is to build a house for her children, and to boost her business because it has gained her independence.

loans.use: to increase her inventory (palm oil, rice, charcoal, beans, okra, peppers, etc.) before the rainy season.

loans.name: Zoe N.

texts.en:
Zoe is 31 years old and lives in the West Point community, which is a populated area in Montserrado county. She is single with two children, ages 3 and 10. Both of her kids are going to school. Zoe is a high school graduate and she is a potential businesswoman. Her fiancé is not working. Notwithstanding, Zoe manages her business well to enable her to support her home. 

Over the past two years, Zoe has been running a medicine store in the local market without facing any serious problem. This business started with a little amount she got from her fiancé. She sells everyday, spending 10 hours with her business. 

In so doing, she is requesting a loan to purchase more paracetamol, quinine, aspirin, ibuprofen, etc. for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more paracetamol, quinine, aspirin, ibuprofen, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
This is Nancy, who lives at Sinkor in Montserrado County, the capital city of Liberia; it is well known as the commercial city of Liberia. Nancy is 37 years old, and a widow with 7 children, ages 10 to 21.  They live at home and attend school. 

For the past five years she has been operating a cook shop (restaurant), selling rice and soup in the community market. She started this business with help from her husband who worked as driver, and learned this way of selling from her mother. 

Nancy sells for 12 hours each day in a week. She used a taxi most of the time to get her stock at her shop. She enjoys the flows of customers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more pepper, oil, onion, Vita, rice, etc to increase her sales. 

She wants to get more money to educate her children and build a house. She appreciates Kiva for their support.

loans.use: to buy more pepper, oil, onion, Vita, rice, etc to increase her sales.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 44 years old and lives in the West Point community, which is a populated area in Montserrado County. She is living with her spouse and two-year-old child. 

She has been selling sugar, candy, etc, which she manages well. These goods have being sold for the past six years without encountering any problem. Her mother assisted with some funds, which she used to start her business. 

She is asking for a loan to buy more sugar, candy, etc, for her business in order to have some sustainable future plan.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, candy, etc, for her business

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 27 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has a 4-year-old child, who lives with her and attends school. 

For five years now she has been selling sugar, candy, chewing gum, biscuits, etc. She sells from morning hours to evening hours every day. She enjoys having her own money. 

She has requested a loan to purchase more sugar, candy, chewing gum, biscuits, etc. 

In the future, she wants to be her own boss and wants her children to live a good life. She thanks BRAC Liberia for their continuous support.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, candy, chewing gum, biscuits, etc.

loans.name: Kisakye Kimwanyi Group

texts.en:
Hasifa is a 35-year-old single mother, and a member of the Kisakye women’s group. She has four children, who all go to school. She is in the restaurant business, and she is a third-time borrower with UGAFODE Microfinance Limited. Her previous loan was UGX 500,000, and she is now requesting another loan. The purpose of this loan is to buy a fridge for her restaurant. A fridge will enable her to increase her income, by selling both cold drinks and food.

She is so grateful to the institution because of the support they have provided to her, as a single mother, and she is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the interest they have in the livelihoods of people like her. She is hardworking and God-fearing.

In the photo are the group members and the UGAFODE credit officer, who is seated.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for her restaurant business

loans.name: Fortunate

texts.en:
Fortunate is 45 years old and is married with four children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and he receives a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Fortunate grows maize, beans, coffee, vegetables, sweet potatoes and bananas. He also has pigs and chickens.

Fortunate has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. 

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (a smartphone, a solar charging set and a weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, which will help them to improve their crop yields and increase their incomes. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, Fortunate will meet the school fee requirements for his children. His biggest dreams in life are to become a successful farmer and to see his community adopt improved agricultural practices.

loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, a solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 46-year-old married woman who has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years. She has seven buffaloes and sells their milk to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit. 

Shahnaz has become famous for providing good-quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her fourth loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase one more buffalo. Shahnaz is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo

loans.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es: Morena de 42 años de edad es divorciada y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 18 y 20 años de edad y su pequeño nieto de 4 años de edad. Morena trabaja como empleada doméstica por lo que recibe un salario mensual que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción del corredor de la vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, polines y madera.
texts.en: Morena, who is 42 years old, is divorced and lives in her own home with her two children, who are ages eighteen and twenty, and her little four-year-old grandson. Morena works as a domestic and earns a monthly salary that allows her to support her family and maintain her household economy. In order to improve her living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in building her home's corridor, which she has been unable to finish due to lacking financial resources. She will use the requested amount to buy sheet metal, beams, and wood.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, beams, and wood to finish building a corridor in her home.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan José tiene 38 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Morropon una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bailes tradicionales del Tonderos, elaboración de dulces típicos de la zona y el trabajo artesano de joyas de plata, su población también se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la elaboración de pan y dulces, esta actividad lo realiza de manera diaria, es un emprendedor que ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de insumos, sacos de harina, azúcar, levadura entre otros para la preparación de sus productos y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juan José is 38 years old. He lives in the district of Morropon, a community known for its tonderos (traditional dances), its traditional home-made local sweets, and its craftmanship in silver jewelry. Residents also work as farmers, merchants, and raising livestock. It is located two hours from the city of Piura, on Peru's northern coast.

He works making bread and pastries. He does this every day. As an entrepreneur, he is requesting a 1,000 nuevos soles loan from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy ingredients: sacks of flour, sugar, yeast, and other items to prepare his products and offer them to his customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for baking.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
42-year-old Cecelia lives in the West Point area. She is a 10th grade dropout. She is married and has five children between 3 and 22 years old; all of whom live at home and attend school.

For the past four years, she has been involved in the sale of red oil, rice, pepper, etc. Her main challenge is the large amount of competition in her community, but her business is going well. Cecelia has requested this loan to purchase more red oil, rice, pepper, etc. to resell. In the future, she would like to buy some land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil, rice, pepper, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is 29 years old and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a hard-working and very honorable man; always committed to getting ahead.

All his life, he has been working hard and earning money to assist his family. He is a kind man who works as a soldier in the public sector, making a low salary. He intends to buy home appliances for his house, but the amount he has is not enough to buy what he needs.

So, he is requesting a loan from AMB to buy home appliances and furniture to use in his house. He dreams to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy home appliances and furniture to use in his house.

loans.name: Konah

texts.en:
Konah lives in Montserrado county, the capital city of Liberia. It is well known as the commercial city of Liberia. She 40 years old and single with three children, ages between 4 and 21 years old, who are in school and live at home. 

For the past three years now, she has been selling charcoal in the community market. She started this business with help from her boyfriend, and learned this way of selling from her mother. She spends eight hours each day on her business, and she uses taxi most of the time to get her goods to her table. She described herself as a business minded woman, and likes her business because it gives her more profits. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more charcoal to expand her sales. She want to make more money to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to expand her sales.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 30 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is married and has 3 children. Catherine was able to complete 12th grade. Her husband works as a policeman. 

Catherine has operated a business selling cosmetics for 2 years. Some days the business is good; some others, it is very slow. Catherine started this business with a little money from her susu (local saving accounts). Now she is proud to support herself and her children. Catherine has requested a loan to purchase more cosmetics to resell. In the future, she hopes to build a house. She wants to be in good health so she can repay the money and keep supporting her children.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics to resell

loans.name: Sharly

texts.en: Sharly lives in West Point. She is married and has 2 children, ages 4 and 12, both in school. For the past 2 years, Sharly has been selling slippers at the local market. She sells charcoal for one of her friends to enable her to start her own business. She learned the business from her best friend, and she likes it because she generates some money every time she sells something. Sharly is requesting a loan to purchase more slippers for her business. Her dream is to build a house and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business

loans.name: Eleie

texts.en:
48-year-old Eleie lives in the town of West Point. She is single, and has two children. They both live with her and are attending school. 

For two years now she has been selling used clothes in the local market. She sells from morning and afternoon time six days of the week. She has a regular group of customers that visits her table for new opening of her used clothes. She gives goods on credit to some customers, and collects the money later; most interestingly she makes her own money. 

Eleie has requested a loan to purchase more used clothes. 

In the future, she wants to be her own boss and wants her children to live a good life. She thanks BRAC Liberia for their continuous support.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes.

loans.name: Princess

texts.en:
Princess is 31 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has a 1-year-old child. 

Princess sells rice by the bag in the local market; she has been doing this for three years. 

She is going to buy additional rice for her business. 

She says sometimes the business is very good, and she has good profits; sometimes it's slow and she doesn't make any money. 

She likes having customers around. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy additional rice for her business.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 37 years old and lives at the West Point area, which has the most populated market in Montserrado County. She is married, and has three children ages 10, 19, and 21, whose are presently in school and live at home. She described herself as a hardworking woman.  

For the past three years, she has been selling soft drinks in the local market. She sells six days in a week from 8 am to 9 pm; she likes how fast her customers buy from her. She started this business by selling for her mother. She used a taxi to get her stock.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks for her business.   

She plans to build a house and attend a university. She likes to say thanks to the lenders who support BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Unidas Para Alcanzar El Exito Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “UNIDAS PARA ALCANZAR EL EXITO” está integrada por 08 socias trabajadoras. Una de sus integrantes es Carmela de 41 años, ella es madre de 4 hijos, en la alcancía tiene el cargo de tesorera el que desempeña con mucha responsabilidad. Carmela se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza empezó este negocio hace 4 meses animada por una amiga, los productos que más vende son cremas, perfumes y shampoo, ella esta agradecida porque gracias a su trabajo solventa los estudios de sus hijos. El préstamo solicitado  lo utilizara para la compra de productos de belleza de esa manera cumplirá con los pedidos de sus clientas y podrá comprar para tener en stock. Carmela esta agradecida a los inversionistas de KIVA por este préstamo que es de mucha ayuda para ella y su grupo comunal. En la foto es la que viste polo color turqueza sin mangas, el Sr. Maximo no se encuentra en la foto pidio permiso por motivos personales, la Sra que viste polo azulino es una clienta pasiva del grupo.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Unidas Para Alacanzar El Exito" (United for Reaching Success) consists of eight hardworking members. One of the members is Carmela. She is a 41-year-old mother of four children and serves as the group treasurer with great responsibility. Carmela started selling beauty products four months ago with one of her friends. The products she sells the most are crèmes, perfumes, and shampoo. She is grateful for her work because it has allowed her to provide for her children's education.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy beauty products. This will enable her to have stock so that she can fulfill the orders from her customers. Carmela is grateful to the Kiva lenders for this loan since it will be a great help to her and her Communal Bank. In the photo, Carmela is wearing turquoise sleeveless shirt.

Sr. Maximo does not appear in the photo because he requested permission for personal reasons. The woman wearing a blue shirt is an inactive member of the group.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es: Ana de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella posee un pequeño negocio ubicado en su casa de habitación donde vende golosinas y refrescos, desde hace un año, tiene mucha clientela por los buenos precios, con la que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos que se les presentan en el hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para comprar mas mercadería como: gaseosa, jugos, agua , galletas, churros, dulces, etc. y continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi podrá seguirle dando a su familia junto con su esposo lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ana is 41 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She has a small business located in her home where she sells snack foods and soft drinks. Her business has been in operation for a year. Ana has many customers because she offers good prices. This enables her to make sales so that she can help her husband with some of the household expenses.

Ana is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise such as sodas, juices, water, cookies, snacks, and sweets so that she can continue her work. This is her only source of income and she would like to continue helping her husband provide what their family needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, water, cookies, snacks, and sweets.

loans.name: Maria Lidia

texts.es: María de 61 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo quien es jornalero y sus tres hijos. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan. El negocio lo tiene adecuado en su hogar de habitación desde hace 25 años. Este negocio es muy importante ya que con lo que gana su esposo no logran cubrir los gastos del hogar. Solicita este crédito FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (harina, sal, levadura, etc.) Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así invertir en su negocio con el fin de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 61 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, who is a laborer, and their three children. She works as a baker, making bread. Her business has been set up in her home for 25 years. Her business is very important to them because what her husband earns is not enough to cover their household expenses. 

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing the ingredients she needs (flour, salt, yeast, etc.) This financing will allow her to invest in her business in order to improve her sales and income, which in turn will improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, salt, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Jardines De La Luz Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JARDINES DE LA LUZ”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Erlinda ella es viuda y tiene 52 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, la socia lo vende por catálogos ofreciendo a diferentes personas o amigos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar labiz labiales, cremas y perfumes.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tortas, negocio de imprenta, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de cosméticos.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank Jardines de la Luz. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

Erlinda is one of its members. She is a widow and is 52 years old. She has three children. Her business is selling beauty products. She works selling lipsticks, creams, and perfumes by catalog. She offers her products to different people and friends, and works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She has been in this business for five years now and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to open a shop where she could sell her beauty products. She is requesting this loan to buy lipsticks, creams, and perfumes.

The other members do business selling cakes, printing services, selling groceries, and selling cosmetics.

Member Erlinda wants to thank everyone who is a part of this dream by making these resources available and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks, creams, and perfumes.

loans.name: Latifa

texts.en:
Latifa is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and seven children; five of them attend public primary school in Jenin. Jenin is a Palestinian city in the northern West Bank. It serves as the administrative center of the Jenin government, and is a major agricultural center for the surrounding towns. In 2007, the city had a population of 39,004.

Latifa is asking Ryada for this loan to paint her house and build doors and windows, which will help warm her house, especially now in the winter. Latifa is very grateful to everyone who helps her. 

The one who appears on the photo is her husband, Loa’ay. For cultural reasons, she can’t publish her photos online, so she apologies.

loans.use: to paint her house and build doors and windows, which will help keep her house warm, especially now in the winter.

loans.name: Alaa'

texts.en:
Alaa’ is 28 years old. He lives in Nablus with his wife and two children. He works as an employee at a constriction field.
Alaa’ is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to repair the ceiling to prevent the flowing of rain water and to paint the walls. That will give warmth for his family at home and reflect a better life conditions. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to repair the ceiling to prevent the flowing of rain water.

loans.name: Saa'ed

texts.en:
Saa'ed is 32 years old and lives with his family in Gaza; he has four children. Three years ago, he started his own coffee shop business for hot drinks usage in his town. It was an impressive step forward, and that's why he is working hard to improve it.

Saa'ed still needs to improve his business, so he asked Ryada for this loan to buy a refrigerator and expand the coffee business. This will increase his customers, which will lead to increasing his income. He hopes that someday his shop will be the most well-known shop in his town.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and expand the coffee business.

loans.name: Goadalupe

texts.es:
Goadalupe tiene 58 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Morropon, una ciudad conocida por el tradicional baile del Tondero, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores caprinos, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de alimentos balanceados y compra de cerdos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos paras su familia.
texts.en:
Goadalupe, 58, lives with his wife in the district of Morropon, a city known for the traditional dance of Tondero. The people in the area, part of the Piura region on the north coast of Peru, work in agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Goadalupe raises and sells small animals like goats. He has asked for a loan of 3000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and to buy pigs to offer his customers, so that he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and balanced feed to fatten the animals.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andrés, es un padre que se dedica a trabajar muy duro para darles  a sus dos hijos de 13 y 10 años de edad lo mejor, se dedica a cultivar granos básicos (maíz, frijol y maicillo) y también realiza trabajos de albañilería, son oficios que aprendió por su propia cuenta y ya tiene 15 años de realizarlos.
En esta ocasión utilizara el capital para pagar la recolección de la cosecha de la temporada, lo que le facilitara tener sus granos básicos a la venta en un menor tiempo y asimismo tener sus ganancias a tiempo para cancelar las cuotas del crédito.
Sueña con dar a sus hijos la oportunidad de superarse académicamente y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Andrés, is a father who is dedicated to working hard in order to give his two children, ages 10 and 13, the best in life. He grows basic grains (corn, beans and sorghum) and also does masonry work. He is self-taught in these trades and has been doing them for 15 years.

He will use the loan to pay for the seasonal harvest, which will make it take less time to get his grains on sale, and therefore he can make his profits in time to pay his debts.

He dreams of giving his children the chance to succeed academically and improve his home.

loans.use: to pay for the seasonal harvest.

loans.name: Sandra Fabiola

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 23 años de edad estado civil casada vive con el esposo  y con sus hijos de 2 y 3 años, Vive en el  Cantón Pueblo viejo provincia de los Ríos.
La ventanilla se llama LA PAULINA se encuentra ubicada en el parroquia Puerto Pechiche recinto La Paulina, pertenece al cantón Pueblo Viejo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.
Sandra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace tres años y a la cría de animales. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes para la siembra de maíz y arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener un sembrío de cacao.
Le gusta jugar con sus hijos en sus tiempos libres.
texts.en:
Sandra is 23 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and their two children, who are ages two and three. She lives in the canton of Pueblo Viejo, in Los Ríos province.

Her solidarity group is La Paulina, located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche in La Paulina, which belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of this solidarity group work farming and raising livestock.

Sandra is a farmer growing corn and rice and raising animals. She has been doing this for three years. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market of that town.

She is requesting this loan to buy supplies and fertilizer for growing corn and rice. The loan has helped her increase the income available to her family and to invest. Her dream is to have a cacao plantation. In her spare time, she enjoys playing with her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is a 26-year-old who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. Approximately one year ago, Abdullah started his business; a grocery store selling staples. He did this in order to generate enough income to support his household, where he lives with his family. This business is Abdullah’s source of income, so that he is able to give his family a better quality of life. 

With the thought of generating more income and being able to offer his customers a greater variety of products, Abdullah wants to increase the stock of products that he has. However, he does not have enough capital to be able to buy the products from his providers. He therefore requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB, which will give him the opportunity to buy food staples in order to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety. 

He hopes that with the loan, he will be able to increase his sales because he will be offering his customers more products. He hopes to be able to give his family a better quality of life and greater possibilities for progress.

loans.use: to buy food staples in order to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety.

loans.name: Marima

texts.en: Marima lives in Buchanan and is 26 years old and married with an 11-year-old child who is in school and lives at home. Her husband works with a road contractor company. She started  her food  business  with money given to her by her mother and learned the business from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more oil and peppers for her business. Her plans are to buy a piece of land and build a house for her child.

loans.use: to purchase more oil and peppers for her business

loans.name: Ramiro Enrique

texts.es: Ramiro de 66 años de edad habita en casa muy sencilla junto a sus hijos mayores de edad y un nieto de 5 años. Ramiro trabaja como ordenanza de una institución cercana a su localidad desde hace mucho tiempo, de esta forma ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y sigue colaborando con los gastos del hogar.Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la elaboración del corredor de la vivienda ya que desea cerrarlo y así contar con mayor seguridad y comodidad. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Ramiro, 66, lives in a very simple house together with his grown children and one grandchild, 5 years old. Ramiro has worked as an administrative assistant at an institution near his home for a long time. This is how he has taken care of his children and contributes to the household costs.

He asks for this loan from FUSAI to build a hallway in his home because he wants to close it off and have greater security and comfort. He will use the loan to buy wood and galvanized tin.

loans.use: to buy galvanized tin and wood.

loans.name: Las Lomas De San Juan Group

texts.es: El grupo “Las Lomas De San Juan”  está conformado por 08 socios comprometidos y responsables que poco a poco han ido mejorando por el bienestar de sus familias. Este es el caso de Carmen de 26 años casada y tiene 01 hijo dependiente. Carmen se dedica a la compra de pollos donde luego son distribuidas en mercados y tiendas, este negocio lo realiza juntamente con su madre. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de pollos, pues tiene pedidos por entregar. El deseo de Carmen es de seguir trabajando positivamente. El grupo “Las Lomas De San Juan” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Carmen se encuentra de pie, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo rojo con rayas.
texts.en:
The group Las Lomas de San Juan comprises eight members who are committed and responsible. Little by little, they have all made improvements for their families' wellbeing. 

That is the case for Carmen, who is 26 years old and married with one minor child. Carmen works buying chickens, which she later distributes to markets and stores. She runs her business alongside her mother. She is requesting this loan to buy chickens because she has pending orders to deliver. Carmen's desire is to continue working positively. 

The group Las Lomas de San Juan is grateful to Kiva lenders for the help they provide. 

Carmen is standing in the picture. She is the first person from the right, wearing a striped top.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Las Osas Group

texts.es:
La señora teresa de Jesús es de estado civil casada. Tiene 50 años de edad. Curso la secundaria completa. Tiene 4 hijos y los 4 están estudiando. Se dedica a la venta de refacciones, almuerzos y cenas. Inició este negocio con la ayuda de su suegra y a la fecha lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de insumos para poder preparar los alimentos para venderlos. En el futuro desea tener mas capital y poder tener un restaurante.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la venta de zapatos, comida y salon de belleza.

En la fotografia aparecen 7 integrantes, pero, solo a 6 se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Sra. Teresa de Jesús is 50 years old and married. She completed her secondary education. Teresa has four children and all of them are studying. She makes her living by selling snacks, lunches, and dinners. Teresa started her business with help from her mother-in-law and now she has 10 years of experience.

She organized a group so that she could request a loan. Teresa will use the money to buy supplies for preparing the dishes that she sells. In the future, she would like to have more capital and open a restaurant.

The other members of the group sell shoes, prepare food, and manage a beauty salon. There are seven members who appear in the photograph, but only six of them are participating in this loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married woman. She has six school-going children. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanamisi has operated a vegetable stall business for the last three years, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a challenge of stiff competition from other vegetable operators in her business.
 
With the KES 20,000, she wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Bencky

texts.en:
Bencky is 29 years old and lives in the West Point area, which has the most-populated market in Montserrado County. She is single and completed the fifth grade. She describes herself as a hardworking woman.

For the past three years she has been running a shop, where she plaits and dresses hair. She works for six days in a week, from 9AM to 5PM. She likes her business, because of the relationships with her customers. She started this business with money given to her by mother. She uses a shared-taxi every time, to get her goods from home to her business spot.

Bencky is requesting a loan, with which to purchase more artificial hair for her business. She plans to build a house for her children. She would like to say "Thanks," to the lenders who support BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair for her hair dressing business

loans.name: Deddeh

texts.en:
Deddeh is 40 years old and lives in the  community surrounding the Airport of Liberia. She stopped her education at the ninth grade, and she is married and has five children between 2  and 8 years old. They are living with her and going to school. 

For the past ten years she been selling oil, onions, etc., in the local market. The problem that she is facing is the rainy season. She likes her business because it provides her needs. She  is requesting a loan to purchase more oil, onions, etc., for her business. Her  plans are to send her children to college  and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more oil, onions, etc., for her business,

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es: Ella es maria paula, estudiante de campo alto en el programa de auxiliar de enfermería, su sueño es estudiar medicina, pero por recursos económicos no puede ingresar a la universidad, a si que empezó a buscar otros medios y llego a la conlcusion de que tenía que tener una base fundamental la cual le abrira puertas en el mundo laboral y a si poder costear con los gastos de la carrera profesional, al ver que campo alto le daba facilidad de pago, por cuotas, vio que podía empezar a escalar rumbo al sueño con este programa, ahora esta en tercer semestre, lista para ingresara a practicas y poder reforzar y aprender nuevos cosas en las ramas de la salud, desde muy pequeña le ha gustado todo lo referido con la salud, salvar vidas, ayudar al necesitado y estar al margen sobre todos los avances, es una persona que no se rinde a pesar de las adversidades, y por eso lo hace, por cumplir todo lo que se propone y poder ayudar a la comunidad, la mama es su mayor motivación ya que toda la vida ha sido la única que responde por ella, es madre soltera, cabeza de familia, luchadora por el bienestar de su hija, y otro de los sueños es poder responder por la mama como ella lo ha hecho por ella, los primos menores y que ella sea un ejemplo para ellos, quiere darles las bases para que cuando culminen los estudios en bachillerato puedan continuar con el camino universitario y profesional, y a si ayudarlos económicamente y poder decirles que empezando desde abajo se triunfa mejor.
texts.en:
Maria Paula is a CampoAlto student in the nursing assistant program. Her dream is to study medicine, but for economic reasons she is not able to go to university. She looked for other options and came to the conclusion that she needed a basis in fundamentals that would open doors for her in the work world so that she could pay for the costs of a professional career.

Maria Paula discovered that CampoAlto offered easy payments, by installments, and that she could start the path to her dream with this program. Now she is in her third semester and is ready to begin her practical training to reinforce what she has learned and to learn new things in the various branches of healthcare. Since she was very young, she has liked everything related to healthcare, such as saving lives, helping those in need, and being at the cutting edge of new advances.

Maria Paula is a person who does not give up despite adversity, and for this reason she plans to complete everything she has set out for herself to accomplish and to help her community. Her mother is her greatest motivation, because all her life her mother has been the only one to look out for her. Maria Paula’s mother is a single mother, who has needed to be head of her family and to fight for her daughter’s welfare. Another of Maria Paula’s dreams is to be able to look after her mother the way her mother has looked after her.

Maria Paula would also like to look after her young cousins and to be an example for them. She wants to give them a foundation so that when they finish high school they can continue on to university and become professionals. Maria Paula would like to help them economically, and to teach them that success is even greater when one starts from behind.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Bessy Marleny

texts.es:
Bessy es una joven de 28 años de edad, ama de casa en un estado civil de unión libre, madre de un hijo quien es menor de edad y solo ellos tres viven en casa. Su ingreso económico depende de la agricultura la siembra de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y café. Su experiencia de 4 años junto a su compañero de hogar a quien ella apoya diariamente en el campo pero fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad ya que ellos por vocación familiar dependen del trabajo de campo por generaciones. El terreno que poseen es propio el cual está ubicado muy cerca de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminando para dar la asistencia necesaria para que sus cultivos de granos básicos estén al 100% para la cosecha.
Sus planes para el futuro poder tecnificar sus cultivos de granos básicos implementando un sistema de riego por goteo, ampliar más sus cultivos mediante la compra de más tierra y poder sembrar una variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas e implementarlos en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos que incluye la fertilización, limpieza más la mano de obra. Con los insumos que mediante este financiamiento obtendrá Bessy espera una buena producción, un excelente resultado y al final de todo mayores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Bessy is a young woman of 28. She is a housewife and lives in a free union relationship. She is the mother of a son who is a minor, and only the three of them live in their home. Their economic income depends on agriculture, plantings of basic foodstuffs such as corn, beans, and coffee. She has four years of experience working with her partner, whom she helps in the field every day, but it was her parents who taught her to work the land at a very early age, since by family tradition they have depended on farm work for generations. The land that they work is their own, and it is located very close to their home, so they walk there to give the needed care so that their crops of basic foods are at 100% for the harvest.

Her plans for the future are to modernize their plantings of basic foods using a system of drip irrigation, further expand their plantings by purchasing more land, and being able to plant a variety to offer her customers.

For these reasons, she is now applying for a loan to buy agricultural supplies and use them in maintaining her plantings, which includes fertilizing, weeding, and labor. With the supplies that she will obtain through this loan, Bessy expects to have good production, an excellent bottom line, and in the end, better income for the sustenance of her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to help care for her plantings of basic foods

loans.name: Elsie S.

texts.en:
Elsie S. is 37 years old and live in the Airport area. She is married and has three children between the ages of four and nine that are in school and live at home. 

For the past nine years, she has been running a shortbread business. She learned this way of selling from her mother and enjoys the profit she makes from her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more sugar, flour, wood and other items for her business. Her plans are to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, flour, wood and other items for her business

loans.name: Dinora Del Carmen

texts.es: Dinora de 45 años de edad desde hace 23 años posee un taller de costura ubicado en su lugar de residencia, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus tres  hijos ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar  ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y positiva, además, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren, ya cuenta  con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para  invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: telas, hilos, elástico, etc. para la elaboración de variedad de prendas de vestir. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes de tal forma que los clientes se sientan motivados a seguir solicitando sus servicios y así sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados. Espera lograr su objetivo y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dinora is 45 years old and has managed a sewing workshop in her home for 23 years. She lives in her own house along with her three children. In addition to sewing and selling clothes, Dinora is a farmer. She is an incredible woman who sets a good example because she is hardworking, responsible, and positive. Many people have provided good references that attest to her character and her work.

Dinora makes a variety of clothes and offers them at very affordable prices. There is also quality in her work. For this reason, many people prefer to do business with her. She already has established customers who come to her each day.

Dinora decided to request a loan so that she can invest in her small business. She will buy needed supplies such as fabric, thread, elastic, and other items for making a variety of clothes. Dinora is doing all of this so that she can provide better service to her customers since they provide her the motivation to continue her work. As a result, her sales and income will increase. She hopes to accomplish her goal and improve the quality of life for herself and her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, and other supplies.

loans.name: Lorena Esperanza

texts.es: Lorena Esperanza solicita el crédito para cambiar el techo de su vivienda, desea ponerlo de Zinc. Lorena es casada, su esposo trabaja en construcción. Tiene 3 hijos, dos de los cuales son independientes a ella. Lorena trabaja en una oficina, y también renta habitaciones en su vivienda. Su sueño es poder construir su casa de dos pisos, para lo cual junto a su esposo trabaja arduamente día a día.
texts.en: Lorena Esperanza is applying for the loan to change the roof of her home. She wants to put on galvanized roofing. Lorena is married. Her husband works in construction. They have three children, two of whom are independent. Lorena works in an office, and she also rents rooms in her home. Her dream is to be able to construct a two-story home, for which, along with her husband, she works hard every day.

loans.use: to buy galvanized roofing sheets and purlins to change the roof of her home

loans.name: Maria Imelda

texts.es: Maria de 58 años de edad se dedica  a la venta de granos básicos desde hace varios  años, posee mucha clientela pues un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien es agricultor, su hija  y sus tres nietos, Doña Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor y así abastecerse con mas productos para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 58 years old and has been selling basic staples for several years. Since there is a great demand for the products she sells, Maria has many customers as a result of her work. By working with her husband, she is able to cover some of the household expenses. Maria lives in her home with her husband, who is a farmer, and also with her daughter and her three grandchildren.

Doña Maria is requesting a loan so that she can buy more merchandise in bulk. This will enable her to restock with more products so that she can generate more income and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, corn, and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Khonzoda

texts.ru: Хонзода немолодая 55-летняя женщина. Она очень деятельная и предприимчивая женщина. Сейчас она решила открыть свой торговый бизнес. Она заинтересована в купле и продаже женской одежды. Хонзода уже приобрела помещение на рынке своего района Кургантюбе. Она берет кредит в размере 2000 долларов США, так как собственного сбережения не хватает. Хонзода планирует оптом привозить товар с рынка города Душанбе и продавать по розничной цене в своей торговой точке в районе Кургантюбе. Хонзоде в новом бизнесе будут помогать сыновья. Она решительно настроена на успех.
texts.en: Khonzoda is an older woman of 55. She is a very active and enterprising woman. She has decided to open a shop. She is interested in buying and selling  women's clothing. Khonzoda already has a stall in her local market in Qurgan-Tube. She is taking out a $2,000 loan, since she doesn't have enough savings. Khonzoda plans to buy goods wholesale from the market in Dushanbe and resell at a retail in her shop in Qurgan. Khonzoda's new business will help her children. She is determined to succeed.

loans.use: buy seasonal women's clothing to start a business.

loans.name: Las Poderosas De Ventanilla Alta Group

texts.es: Yanina es una de las socias de la alcancía LAS PODEROSAS DE VENTANILLA ALTA  ella tiene 30 años es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Si bien es cierto su esposo trabaja como obrero muchas veces el dinero no alcanza debido a eso decidió apoyarlo trabajando,  hace 2 años empezó su propio negocio una tienda de abarrotes donde trabaja diariamente sus mejores clientes son sus vecinas quienes diariamente acuden a comprarle. Con el dinero de su préstamo podrá adquirir productos para su tienda, gracias a su préstamo puede  tener la tranquilidad de seguir trabajando para apoyar a su familia.Yannina desea seguir creciendo y mas adelante le gustaría abrir otra tienda con el mismo rubro, agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por el préstamo para ella y todo su grupo comunal, en la foto es la ultima de la izquierda viste falda floreada.
texts.en:
Yanina is one of the members of the Communal Bank "Las Poderosas de Ventanilla Alta". She is 30 years old, married, and has three children. Although her husband works as a laborer, there is often times not enough money. For this reason, she decided to help him by working. Yanina started her own business two years ago. She has a grocery store and works each day to serve her best customers, which include her neighbors who visit daily in order to make purchases.

The money from her loan will be used to acquire products for her store. Thanks to these funds, she will have the peace of mind that she needs to continue working in order to support her family. Yanina wants to keep growing and would like to open another store going forward that offers the same products. On behalf of herself and the rest of her Communal Bank, she would like to thank the Kiva lenders for this loan. In the photo, Yanina is the last person on the row wearing a floral skirt.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: María Milagro

texts.es:
María de 26 años de edad, logro estudiar hasta sexto grado, de su familia es la que más se preparó, ya que sus hermanos no tuvieron la misma oportunidad y tuvieron que incorporarse a temprana edad a las labores productivas en la agricultura y otros emigraron a Estados Unidos buscando mejores empleos. Dejando como última opción el estudiar. Esta joven está acompañada y tiene un hijo de tres años.
María se dedica al comercio, vendiendo ropa y cosméticos, esto los comercializa pasando casa por casa en el cantón y sus alrededores, también vende por encargo.
Realiza esta actividad desde hace 7 años, por lo cual es bien conocida en estos lugares por los clientes. Antes, de dedicarse al comercio solamente se limitaba a realizar los quehaceres del hogar.
El préstamo lo necesita para surtir el negocio de ropa y cosméticos, ya que en esta época navideña hay muchos pedidos y en este momento no cuenta con el suficiente capital para aprovechar la oportunidad que se presenta; oportunidad de obtener mejores ingresos por la demanda que hay en estos meses de sus productos.
Sueña con poseer su propia sala de belleza, que además de vender artículos de belleza, también brindar servicios para el cuido de la salud y belleza.
Para lograr esto desea capacitarse sobre esta área y ahorrar para contar con el local y equipo adecuado.
texts.en:
Maria, who is 26 years old, managed to go to school through the sixth grade. Of her family, she is the one who studied the longest, since her siblings did not have the same opportunity,. They had to begin productive labor in agriculture at an early age, and others emigrated to the United States seeking better employment, leaving studying as a last resort. This young woman has a partner and a three-year-old son.

Maria works in commerce, selling clothing and cosmetics. She sells these going door to door in the canton and its outskirts. She also sells through orders. She has been doing this work for 7 years, and so she is well known in these places by her customers. Before working in commerce, she limited herself to doing household tasks.

She needs the loan to stock her clothing and cosmetics business, since at this Christmas season there are many orders, and at this time she doesn't have sufficient capital to take advantage of the opportunity that exists, the opportunity to obtain better income because of the demand that exists for her products in these months.

She dreams of having her own beauty salon, where in addition to selling beauty products, she would also offer services for the care of health and beauty. To achieve this, she wants to train in this area and save to have the location and appropriate equipment.

loans.use: to stock her clothing and cosmetics business, since in the Christmas season there are many orders, and at this time she doesn't have sufficient capital to take advantage of the opportunity

loans.name: Kumbah

texts.en: Kumbah lives in Airport. She is 49 years of age and stopped her education at third grade. She is married with nine children who live at home and attend school. Her husband is a missionary. For the past eight years, she has been selling slippers in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from people in the market at the time she was not selling. She enjoys the business because of the numbers of experiences she has every day. Her plan is to purchase more slippers to expand her business and build a shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers to sell

loans.name: Julia

texts.en: Julia lives in the communities surrounding Airport. She is 49 years of age, married and has five children who live at home and attend school. For the past 15 years, she has been selling rice by the cup in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from friends. She enjoys the flows of customers. Her plan is to purchase more rice by the bag to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more rice to sell

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en: Please meet 41-year-old Kebbeh from Liberia. To be precise, she lives in the community surrounding Airport. She is married and has five children between 3 and 19 years old. Only four of the children live at home and attend school. For the past two years, she has been running a shop where she sells red oil, bitter ball, etc. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from her friends. She sells from Monday to Saturday, spending 15 hours on her business. She is appreciative of her business because she makes more money. Her plan is to build a house. She is requesting a loan to purchase additional red oil, bitter ball, etc. for her business. She'd like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

loans.use: to purchase additional red oil, bitter ball, etc. to sell

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en: This is Amelia from Liberia. She lives in the Airport area of Margibi County. She is 38 years old and she and her fiancé lives together with seven children between the ages of 1 and 13. Only six of her children are in school and they all live at home. Her fiancé works with Firestone. She was unfortunate not to attend school, so she decided to do this business. Over the past 10 years, she has been selling rice, pepper, flour etc in the local market for eight hours from Monday to Saturday. She described herself as a hard working woman. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, and flour for her business. Her plan is to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, and flour to sell

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie lives in the Airport area of Margibi County. She is married and has five children between the ages of 3 and 21, only three of whom are in school and they all live at home. Her husband is a businessman. She is 39 years of age and she completed 8th grade before starting her business. For the past 10 years now, she has been selling rice, pepper, sugar, salt, etc in the local market, spending nine hours on her business from Monday to Saturday. She described herself as a hard working businesswoman. She is requesting a loan to purchase more onions, rice, pepper, salt, etc for her business. Her plan is to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more onions, rice, pepper, salt, etc to sell

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Please meet 39-year-old Sarah from Liberia; she lives in the community surrounding Airport.  She is single, with a one-year-old child who lives at home. 

For the past five years, she has been baking and selling bread in the local market.  She started her business with money from her mother, and learned this way of selling from her.  She sells from 7 am to 4 pm from Monday to Saturday. She is grateful for her business because she get money every day.  

Her plans are to build a house and expand her business. 

Sarah is requesting a loan to purchase more flour, sugar, butter, etc. for her bread business. 

She would like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, butter, etc for her bread business.

loans.name: Diana Mileidy

texts.es:
Ella es diana mileidy, estudia auxiliar de enfermería porque quiere ayudar a las personas cuando mas lo necesiten y porque después de una experiencia personal salio con la profesión,a parte de ayudar a su comunidad también estudia para ayudarle a la familia en especial a la mama ya que ella le ha brindado toda la ayuda posible para que la hija estudie lo que a ella le apasiona, y a si ayudarle a su mama económicamente. Ella estudia para ser una gran profesional y seguir escalando en el área de la salud tener los recursos suficientes para estudiar medicina y especializare en pediatría y asi ayudar a madres que lo necesitan.
Esta con este convenio ya que es un paso posible para su mama que es madre cabeza de hogar poder pagar estas cuotas, ella va para tercer semestre, un gran logro para ella y va a pasar hoja de vida para contrato y a si lograr aprender mas y dar un buen servicio en el hospital donde la asignen y poder seguir pagando la carrera y no colocar tanto peso a la mama, ella quiere que su familia y comunidad estén felices por el gran paso que ella esta dando y saber que pueden contar con ella cuando la necesiten. El convenio que esta brindando una ayuda para que ella pueda salir adelante y sacar su futuro adelante es muy bueno y no es tan cómodo pero esto le ayuda mucho. Esta feliz por aprender mas sobre el área de la salud y siempre le ha gustado estudiar esto desde que se encontraba en el colegio, ahora esta mas que segura y dispuesta a continuar estudiando.
texts.en:
Diana Mileidy is studying to be a nursing assistant because she wants to help people when they most need it. She also chose this profession because of a personal experience. In addition to helping her community, she is also studying to help her family. She would especially like to help her mother economically, because her mother has helped her as much as possible so that she could study what she was passionate about.

Diana Mileidy is studying to be a great professional and to continue working her way up in the field of healthcare. She would like to have enough resources to study medicine and specialize in pediatrics so that she can help mothers who need it.

Diana Mileidy was able to choose this program because her mother – who is head of her household – was able to afford its installment payments. Diana Mileidy is now in her third semester, which is a great achievement for her. She is now going to circulate her resume to find a work placement, where she will learn more and do good work for the hospital to which she is assigned. She will also be able to pay for her career and help her mother with its cost.

Diana Mileidy would like her family and her community to be happy for the big step she is taking, and for them to know that they can count on her when they need to. The program that is helping her get ahead and build her future is very good, but not easy, which helps her a lot. She is happy to learn more about the field of healthcare, which she has always liked to study, ever since she was in elementary school. Now she is very confident and eager to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир – из Павлограда. Он более 10 лет занимается выездной торговлей, продавая сезонную женскую обувь. Бизнес у Владимира налаженный, опыт работы солидный. 
Этой зимой Владимир планирует реализовывать зимнюю женскую обувь из кожзаменителя, которая доступна большинству покупательниц, рассчитана на средний класс и хорошо расходится. Для закупки дополнительной партии этой обуви разных моделей Владимиру нужна сумма в 20 000 гривен.
texts.en:
Vladimir is from Pavlograd. He has more than ten years of experience in sales. He sells women's shoes in season. Vladimir's business is established, and he has solid experience.

This winter Vladimir plans to sell women's winter shoes made ​​of artificial leather, which is affordable to most shoppers. This is calculated to appeal to the middle class with good results.  Vladimir needs 20,000 hryvnia to buy more shoes of different styles.

loans.use: purchase imitation leather boots wholesale.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia vive con su mama, papa y hermana, está estudiando la carrera de Licenciatura en Pedagógica, y comenta que su sueño es Terminar la carrera pedagógica, ser buena profesional, independiente, y poder ayudar a las personas carenciadas.
Dice también que le gustaría poder ayudar a su familia en la forma que ellos se merecen, un motivo más por el cual ella se está esmerando bastante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, que le será de gran ayuda en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Patricia lives with her mother, father, and sister. She is studying for a degree in Education. Patricia says that her dream is to finish her degree, become a successful professional, be independent, and be able to help people in need. She says that she would also like to help her family in the way that they deserve. Another reason for pursuing a degree is that she wants to do her best.

Patricia is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her degree expenses, which will be of great help with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her university expenses.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta de 56 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposo quien se gana la vida como jornalero. Marta se dedica a la elaboración de bordados en manta, bisutería y variedad de productos de lana. Es una mujer muy creativa quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento diario. Desea mejorar su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de la materia prima (hilo, agujas, lana, mantas, etc.) para la elaboración de sus productos y así luego poner a la venta.
texts.en:
Marta is 56 years old and lives in very humble conditions with her husband, who works as a day laborer. Marta works embroidering blankets as well as making costume jewelry and a variety of products made of wool. She is a very creative woman who does everything in her power to make a living and meet her family’s daily needs.

Marta would like to improve her business, which is why she is requesting this loan of FUSAI to buy primary materials such as thread, needles, wool and blankets. She will use these to make her products, which she will then offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, wool and blankets.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
Doña Celsa tiene una edad de 43 años, es madre de 5 hijos muy laboriosa, quienes el mayor esta casados en hogar a parte, el menor de todos estudia en la primaria en la escuela de la comunidad y los otros 3 hermanos ayudan a su padre en las diferentes actividades del campo. Doña Celsa no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar ya que desciende de una familia humildemente económica pero muy trabajadora enseñándole lo más importante en la vida, valores morales, espirituales. Ella agradece a Dios todo poderoso por la familia que tiene ya que a pesar de no haber asistido a la escuela en casa gracias al apoyo de sus hijas ella ha aprendido a leer y escribir teniendo la fe de seguir aprendiendo cada día más. La tierra que ella y su familia trabajan es propia gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio por muchos años. Con una experiencia de más de 14 años en compañía de su esposo ella también se dedica a la cría de cerdos y tiene una vaca lechera con la que produce en pequeña cantidad algunos derivados de la leche para generar más ingresos a la familia.
Sus planes poder cultivar una variedad diferente de producto que ayude a generar mayores ganancias como el maíz y frijoles, implementar un sistema de riego de goteo o con mariposa ya que en la aldea donde ella vive el agua es abundante y limpia, entre otros. 
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de café mismos que ayudaran a dar paso a sus metas, planes, sueños y su hoy en día compromiso.
texts.en:
Doña Celsa is 43 years old, and a hard-working mother of 5 children; the oldest is married and living away from home, the youngest attends primary school in the community, and the other three brothers help their father with different activities on the farm.

Doña Celsa did not have the opportunity to attend school, as she comes from a family with very little economic means. But her family was hard-working, and taught her what was most important in life: moral and spiritual values. 

She thanks Almighty God for the family that she has, because in spite of not having attended school, thanks to the support of her daughters she has learned to read and write at home, and she has faith that she will continue learning more every day. 

The land that she and her family work is their own, thanks to many years of hard work and sacrifice. She has more than 14 years of experience working alongside her husband, and she also raises pigs and has a dairy cow, producing small quantities of dairy products in order to generate more income for the family.

Her plans are to be able to cultivate a different variety of produce that would help her to generate more earnings, such as corn and beans, and to install an irrigation system-- either drip or with butterfly valves--as water is abundant and clean in her village.

For this reason, she is seeking financing; to purchase agricultural supplies so that she can take care of her coffee crop, which will help her to fulfill the goals, plans, dreams, and commitments that she has today.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for taking care of her coffee crop.

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en:
Fatu lives in the Airport area of Margibi County.  She is 27 years old and married with three children between the ages of 5 and 10; two of them are in school and live at home. Her husband works at a company. 

She completed 10th grade before starting her business. For the past seven years now, she has been selling fish in the local market.  She works eight hours from Monday to Saturday.  

She described herself as a hardworking business woman.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business.  

Her plans is to build her house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial, que le permitirá lograr a ser un gran profesional para apoyar y sustentar a su familia.
Está estudiando y trabajando al mismo tiempo, lo cual es muy loable, ya que es muy sacrificado, pero él sabe que el día de mañana todo su esfuerzo tendrá recompensa.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su facultad para poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Ricardo is studying for a degree in Industrial Engineering. This will enable him to become a successful professional so that he can support and sustain his family. Ricardo is studying and working at the same time, which is quite commendable. Even though this requires a great deal of sacrifice, Ricardo knows that all of his efforts will be rewarded someday.

He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the payment of his school expenses. This will enable him to continue his studies as before.

loans.use: to pay for his university expenses.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian vive en Encarnación, trabaja en un estudio jurídico ya hace mas de 5 años, actualmente está cursando el último año de la carrera de derecho y comenta que su principal objetivo es de recibirse e independizarse para su mejor manejo y seguir trabajando en su rama.
