Es una mujer muy sacrificada ya que estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo, y es eso lo que la destaca. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que está a punto de terminar sus estudios y tendrá muchos gastos que cubrir.
texts.en:
Mirian lives in Encarnación and has been working at a law firm for more than five years. She is currently in her final year of her law degree program. Mirian says that her main goal is to receive her degree and become independent. This would be the best way for her to manage her career and continue working in her field.

Mirian is a self-sacrificing woman who is studying and working at the same time, which is something that should be noted. She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her degree expenses. Mirian is at the point in which she is about to finish her degree and there are many expenses that need to be covered.

loans.use: to pay for her law degree expenses.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria está estudiando la carrera de prótesis dental, que le permitirá ayudar a las personas que necesitan atención bucal.
Su sueño es poder ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, y es por eso que está esforzándose por cumplirlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder montar su propio taller que le será de mucha ayuda para sus prácticas de prótesis.
texts.en:
Maria is studying for a degree in Dental Prosthetics, which would allow to assist people in need of dental care. Her dream is to be able to help her family through her work. For this reason, she strives to complete her degree.

Maria is requesting this loan so she can establish her own workshop, which will be a great help in her practice of making prostethics.

loans.use: to establish a laboratory for making dental prostethics.

loans.name: Lidia Del Socorro

texts.es: Lidia es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos varios. Es casada, tiene 6 hijos, quienes  son independientes a ella. Su esposo hace algunos meses sufrió un accidente muy grave, por lo qué ahora no está trabajando. Lidia tiene que hacer un esfuerzo extra para poder llevar la manutención de su familia ella sola. Con el crédito solicitado Lidia terminará unas divisiones en su vivienda, comprará gypsum, perlines y demás materiales necesarios, espera poder terminar estas mejoras y así tener más comodidad.
texts.en:
Lidia works in sales, selling clothing and other products. She is married and has six adult children. Her husband was in a very serious accident a few months ago and is not currently working. Lidia has to put in extra effort to support the family by herself.

Lidia is requesting this loan to finish some dividing walls in her home, for which she will buy sheets of drywall, beams (purlins) and other necessary materials. She hopes to finish these renovations to improve the comfort of her home.

loans.use: to buy sheets of drywall, beams (purlins) and other necessary materials to build dividing walls in her home.

loans.name: Urpis De Confraternidad Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Giovana tiene 34 años de edad es soltera y tiene 01 hijo,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende en uno de los centros comerciales de la ciudad del Cusco,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercaderia como polos entre otros. 

Los socios que salen adjuntos a la foto pidieron permiso para llegar tarde por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de venta de regalos, ferretería, tienda de abarrotes y artesanía. 

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
These are the members of the communal bank “URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD”. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

Giovana is a member of this group. She is 34 years old, single, and has one son. She alternates her daily household work with her business of selling clothing, which she sells in one of the shopping centers in the city of Cusco. She has had this business for some time now, and it does well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into it each day. She is a responsible and hardworking person, which is how she provides for her family.

Giovana is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as shirts and other items.

The members in the thumbnail-sized photos requested permission to arrive late because of work.

The businesses of the other members of the group include selling gifts, a hardware store, a grocery store and making artisanal products.

Giovana is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shirts and other items.

loans.name: Karen Danesia

texts.es:
Karen tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos quienes están en primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Tiene un grado de estudio de secundaria completo graduándose como perito mercantil y contador público gracias al apoyo moral y financiero por parte de sus padres a quienes ella agradece el esfuerzo para que ella pudiese estudiar y graduarse. Karen junto a su esposo trabajan en la agricultura pero ella también trabaja como oficial de negocios en una institución privada de cable desde hace 4 años. Cuentan con 2 manzanas de tierra las cuales fueron obtenidas gracias a una herencia en la cual tienen cultivada café como un ingreso económico más para la familia poniendo de su parte para que este esté bien cuidado, limpio de plagas y enfermedades pero principalmente atractivo para sus clientes.  
Sus planes para el futuro poder comprar un vehículo para poder movilizarse junto a su esposo hasta sus cultivos de café ya que de esa forma ella también podrá facilitar el acarreo de los insumos que son necesarios para sus cultivos. También ella sueña con poder comprar una manzana más de tierra para poder expandir sus cultivos de café ya que junto a su propiedad hay una la cual le gustaría obtener para seguir cultivando.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de café mismos con los que espera obtener excelentes ingresos para poder cumplir con su compromiso de pago para seguir gozando de los beneficios que la cooperativa COMIXMUL le ofrece.
texts.en:
Karen is 35 years old, married, and the mother of two children who are in different grades in primary school. Thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents, Karen completed secondary school and graduated as a certified business expert and accountant. She is very grateful to them for their efforts to make sure that she could study and graduate.
 
Karen and her husband work in agriculture, and Karen has also worked as a business officer in a private cable company for the past 4 years. They have 2 blocks of land which they obtained thanks to an inheritance, and on which they grow coffee as an additional income source for the family. They put in their time so that the land is well taken care of, free of pests and disease; and especially so that it is attractive to their customers.

Karen's plan for the future is to purchase a vehicle which she and her husband will use to travel to and from their land, and to facilitate the transport of the supplies they need for their crops. She also dreams of being able to purchase another block of land in order to expand their coffee cultivation. There is actually a piece of land next to their property that they would like to obtain and begin cultivating. 

Today they have requested financing to purchase agricultural supplies which will support their coffee crops. They hope to obtain excellent earnings in order to fulfill their obligations to pay and to continue reaping the benefits offered by the cooperative COMIXMUL.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to support her coffee crop.

loans.name: Yaquelin

texts.es:
Ella es yaquelin esta estudiando auxiliar de enfermería, en este momento esta en el 3 semestre y en practicas, el motivo por el cual necesita de la colaboración de kiva es porque anteriormente ella pagaba con un auxilio educativo, esto se lo dieron porque ella no trabaja y la mama trabaja en obras de construcción por días, le esta pagando esta carrera ya que a ella le gusta la enfermería porque para ella es una alegría salvar vidas y colaborar a las personas, auxiliar a las personas mas enfermas.
Ella tiene un niño de 10 años y en este momento esta en estado de gestación, vive con sus suegros, pero quien le esta ayudando es la mama, ella es la que el da una mano y en verdad la señora yaquelin se esmera tanto que en este momento esta en practicas, ella estudia tanto para ayudar a darles un auxilio a la gente y para sacar adelante a sus hijos, esperar terminar sus estudios para poder graduarse con alegría.
Señores de kiva por favor espero que le puedan colaborar a yaquelin ya que ella necesita de ustedes.
Si no se puede obtener la ayuda la mama con mucho dolor y pena le dijo que no le podía colaborar en caso que le subieran a la cuota, en el futuro espera ser una excelente enfermera con esmero y esfuerzo.

Gracias
texts.en:
This is Yaquelin, who is studying to become a nursing assistant. At the moment, she is in her third semester of practicums. The reason she needs assistance from Kiva is because she previously paid with financial aid that was given to her because she did not work and her mother was working at construction sites during the day. Yaquelin would like to pay for her degree because she enjoys nursing and getting satisfaction from saving lives, working with other people, and helping those in need of the most care.

Yaquelin has a 10-year-old son and is pregnant at the moment. She lives with her in-laws, but the person who is helping her is her mother who is always willing to give a hand. It is true that Sra. Yaquelin is striving to do her best at the moment while she is in her practicum. She studies because she wants to help people and move forward along with her children. Yaquelin expects to finish her studies so that she can graduate with joy.

Yaquelin asks for the assistance of the Kiva lenders since she is need of their help. Her mother said that she is not able to assist Yaquelin, which gives her great pain and anguish that she cannot help her daughter with her expenses. In the future, Yaquelin hopes to be a successful nurse who works with great care and effort. Thank you.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition and enrollment fees.

loans.name: Yanet Azucena

texts.es:
Yanet es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque es madre de un hijo al cual quiere mucho y por ello con mucha dedicación trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ya que este le permite poder tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Yanet esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá insumos e implementos para su negocio como verduras y abarrotes al por mayor, asimismo cubiertos, platos, vasos, entre otros con lo cual podrá atender mejor a sus clientes y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un gran restaurante”.
texts.en:
Yanet is a very hard-working woman.  This is primarily because she has a child, whom she loves very much.  That is why she works with great dedication in her small business of selling food.  This allows her to be able to have income in order to be able to get ahead.

Janet is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help, she will be able to buy supplies and implements for her business.  She will buy things like vegetables and wholesale groceries.  She will also buy cutlery, plates, and glasses, among other items.  With this she will be able to better tend to her customers.  She will continue struggling in order to make her big dream a reality.  Her dream is to have a large restaurant.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, groceries, utensils, and implements for her business.

loans.name: Crecer Group

texts.es: El grupo “Crecer”  está constituida por 07  socios que han demostrado ser personas responsables.  Clelia es viuda y tiene 03 hijos independiente. A sus 61 años Clelia ha logrado dar educación a sus hijos y mejorar sus ingresos. Actualmente cuenta con una librería ubicada en su vivienda.  En esta oportunidad solicitó el crédito para la compra de útiles escolares como lapiceros, cuadernos, fólderes, borradores, entre otros. El deseo de Clelia es de seguir implementando su negocio, pues así asegura ella tendrá mayores ganancias. El grupo “Crecer” agradecen el apoyo brindado y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Clelia se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo color lila.
texts.en:
The group "Crecer" is composed of 7 partners who have proved to be responsible people. Clelia, who is pictured sitting first on the right and wearing a pink polo shirt, is a widow with three independent children. At 61 years old Clelia has managed to provide her children with an education and to improve her income. 
She currently has a bookstore located in her home. Clelia requested a loan to purchase school supplies such as pens, notebooks, folders, erasers, etc. Her wish is to continue running her business, thereby ensuring that she will have greater earnings. 
The group "Crecer" is grateful for the support they have received and is committed to continue working well.

loans.use: to purchase pens, notebooks, folders and erasers.

loans.name: Rosalva

texts.es: Rosalva de 36 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 17 años y 14 años de edad. Su esposo falleció hace algunos años por lo que Rosalva es la que lleva la economía del hogar y se esfuerza por dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de joyería de plata, acero inoxidable y enchape. Dicho negocio lo tiene desde hace 8 años y la venta la realiza de forma ambulante. Desea invertir en su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería como: anillos, cadenas, pulseras y aretes.
texts.en:
Rosalva, age 36, lives in her own house with her two children, ages 17 and 14.  Her husband passed away some years ago.  That is why Rosalva is the one who manages the finances for the household.  She puts forth great effort to give her family better living conditions.

She buys and sells silver, stainless steel, and silver plated jewelry.  She has had this business for eight years, and she sells in an itinerant manner.

She wishes to invest in her business.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will buy a greater quantity of merchandise like rings, chains, bracelets, and earrings.

loans.use: to buy rings, chains, bracelets, and earrings.

loans.name: Esperanza Y Progreso Group

texts.es: Martha de 58 años es casada y tiene 05 hijos independientes, actualmente pertenece al grupo “Esperanza y Progreso” conformada por 07 socias trabajadoras que han demostrado ser personas responsables. Martha se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir. Con el fruto de su esfuerzo sigue apoyando a su familia. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de polos, pantalones, camisas, blusas y así poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Terminar de construir su vivienda es su mayor deseo. El grupo “Esperanza y Progreso” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Martha se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste polo color rojo.
texts.en: Martha is 58 years old, married, and has five adult children.  Currently, she belongs to the “Esperanza y Progreso” [Hope and Progress] group, which is comprised of seven hard-working members who have proved to be responsible.   Martha sells clothing and continues supporting her family with the fruit of her labors.  She is requesting the loan to purchase T-shirts, pants, shirts, blouses and thus, be able to offer them to her customers.  Her greatest wish is to finish building her home.  The “Esperanza y Progreso” group is grateful to the people that made this loan possible.  Martha is sitting, the first from the left, dressed in a red shirt.

loans.use: to purchase T-shirts, pants, shirts, and blouses.

loans.name: Omaira

texts.es:
Ella es omaira, esta en el área de auxiliar administrativo en salud, a ella esta profesión le sirve para salir adelante en la vida por su hija, ya que es un medio que le sirve para trabajar, igualmente le parece muy interesante estar informada sobre el área de salud y todas sus actualidades y beneficios. Ella vive actualmente con el padre de su hija en el sector de bosa, pagan un arriendo, el es el único que trabaja en la familia, mientras que omaira estudia los sábados y entre semana se la pasa en la casa cuidando a su hija de 2 meses de nacida.
Ella quiere salir adelante con esta carrera, por eso ella quiere que kiva la beneficie ya que ella no tiene el suficiente dinero para poder pagar la cuota que algunos alumnos están pagando por semestre.
Omaira quiere darse un mejor futuro en su vida, y no solo a ella si no también a su hija, brindar un mejor servicio a la gente dándole una buena información y brindándoles un mejor servicio.
texts.en: This is Omaira.  She is in the health care assistant program.  This profession will help her to get ahead in life for her daughter's sake, as it is a means for her to work.  She also finds it very interesting to be informed about healthcare and all its updates and benefits.  She currently lives with her daughter's father in Bosa locality.  They pay rent, and he is the only one working in the family, while Omaira goes to school on Saturdays and stays home taking care of her 2-month-old daughter during the week.  Omaira wants to get ahead via this career path.  She wants Kiva to help her since she doesn't have enough money to pay the tuition some students pay per semester.  Omaira wants to give herself a better future, not just for herself but also for her daughter, and provide a good service to people, giving them good information and providing them with good service.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester

loans.name: Fiorella Esther

texts.es:
Fiorella tiene 20 años y trabaja como ayudante en un pequeño salón de belleza de su ciudad, gracias a este humilde empleo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante, es por ello que le trabaja con mucho empeño y entusiasmo.

Fiorella esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a ello podrá solventar los gastos para poder estudiar un curso sobre coloración de cabello, lo que le permitirá mejorar su trabajo y poder tener un mejor ingreso, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria y poder tener su propio salón de belleza”.
texts.en: Fiorella is 20 and works as an assistant at a small beauty salon in her city. Thanks to this humble job, she can earn an income to get on in life. This is why she works with a great deal of determination and enthusiasm. Fiorella is grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to them, she will be able to pay for the cost of doing a hair-colouring course, which will allow her to improve her work and earn more money. In this way she can continue to fight to turn her great dream into a reality: to do a university degree and to be able to have her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to be able to pay for a course on hair-colouring.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.en:
Since she was young, Mariana loved sewing and clothing. After she immigrated to the US from her native Portugal in 2000, she went into business with her very own tailoring business. Eventually she expanded this business into dry cleaning. For over ten years, she has enjoyed success and has become well known in her South River, New Jersey community.

However, this success stands in stark contrast to the disaster Mariana faced in October 2012 when Hurricane Sandy struck. With the borough of South River being so close to the Raritan River, the storm hit Mariana’s business and community harder than most. Many of the businesses located on her street are still shut down, without any plans of returning. Although Sandy forced Mariana to close for three months, she has worked hard to make 2013 a bounce-back year. Her revenue is now caught up to where it was before the storm, and she has replaced much of the supplies that she lost.

However, she still has more work to be done, and is still catching up with the damage from flooding and three months of closed business. Mariana will use this loan to pay for coat hangers, plastic covers and zippers she needs to run her tailoring and dry cleaning business.

loans.use: to pay for coat hangers, plastic covers and zippers.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es: Adela de 57 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo Y sus dos hijos. Adela se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar. Desea mejorar su negocio de pollos por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de pollos, alimento y vitaminas para los mismos. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que de esta forma espera lograr aumentar las ventas como sus ganancias.
texts.en: Adela, 57, owns her home where she lives with her husband and their two kids.  Adela has been raising and selling chickens for a long time, and this is how she and her husband make their living.  She wants to improve her chicken business, so she requests this loan from FUSAI to buy a larger number of chickens, and food and vitamins for them.  She hopes to receive this funding because with it she hopes to be able to increase her sales and her profits.

loans.use: to buy chickens, and food and vitamins for them

loans.name: Ilce Yessenia

texts.es: Ilce de 22 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus abuelos y su madre. Ilce se dedica a la crianza de pollos desde hace tres años. También trabaja como tutora de niños en su localidad. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos desea invertir en su negocio de pollos comprando mayor cantidad, alimento y vitamina para los animales. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para proceder a hacer la compra y así poder contar con una mayor capacidad de oferta.
texts.en: Ilce, 22, is single and lives with her grandparents and her mother in their own house.  Ilce has been raising chickens for three years.  She also works as a tutor for children in her community.  In order to increase her income she wants to invest in her chicken business by buying a greater quantity of animals and food and vitamins for them.  For this reason she requests this loan from FUSAI so she can make the purchase and be able to have a greater supply capacity.

loans.use: to buy chickens, and food and vitamins for them

loans.name: Adrian Rosendo

texts.es: Adrian Rosendo mayor de edad casado con dos hijos menores de edad, originario de uno de los municipios de chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, zona que se caracteriza por la producción del ron, la caña y la azúcar, es propietario de un taller de ebanistería/carpintería el cual elabora todo tipo de muebles como: roperos, camas, chineros, cómodas, juegos de sillas, comedores, mesitas de noche entre otros, cuenta con clientes fijos y eventuales, en otros municipios como león y chinandega, Adrian poco a poco ha logrado salir adelante en su negocio y les ha brindado a su familia una mejor estabilidad económicas, uno de sus sueños es poder terminar de construir su casa de habitación e tener su negocio en otro lugar donde pueda comercializar mas su muebles, el financiamiento de este crédito es para invertir en capital propio en la compra de madera, pega, tornillos entre otros ya que tiene varios pedidos y la madera con la que cuenta no le cubre sus ventas las realiza al contado al igual que sus compras cuenta con cinco trabajadores ademas de el y su esposa. Adrian agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.-
texts.en: Adrian is married and has two children.  He is originally from a municipality in Chinandega, in the west of Nicaragua.  This is an area known for producing rum and sugar.  Adrian owns a furniture and carpentry workshop where he makes all sorts of furniture, such as wardrobes, beds, china cupboards, commodes, sets of chairs, bedside tables and more.  Adrian has both regular and one-off customers from other towns such as León and Chinandega.  Little by little Adrian has managed to progress with his business and it has given his family more financial stability.  Adrian dreams of being able to finish building his house and to have premises just for his business, so that he can sell more of his furniture.  This loan will be used to invest in working capital by buying wood, glue, screws, and more.  Adrian has various orders to fulfil and he does not have enough wood for these items.  Customers pay Adrian in cash.  Aside from Adrian and his wife, the business has five employees.  Adrian is very grateful to the Kiva lenders who are supporting poor people.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, screws and other items.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: El señor Juan es una persona soltera y no tiene esposa ni hijos dependientes, vive en una casa en alquiler. Su única herramienta de trabajo es un vehículo el cual lo trabaja como trufi y hace una ruta interprovincial en la zona este, pero el mismo se le arruino por fallas mecánicas y es por eso que solicita un crédito para refaccionar su vehículo, ya que tiene gastos pendientes y no puede ahorrar su dinero para poder reparar su herramienta de trabajo, de esta forma podrá seguir trabajando y lograra cubrir todos sus gastos.
texts.en: Juan is single, and has no wife nor dependent children. He lives in a rented house. His only work tool is a vehicle which he operates as a fixed-route taxi, and does an interprovincial route in the eastern area.  But his vehicle has broken down due to mechanical problems, and that is why he is requesting a loan to repair it. He has outstanding expenses and cannot save his money to be able to repair his work tool. In this way he will be able to continue working and will manage to  cover all his expenses.

loans.use: To repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
Jose tiene 23 años y trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos para poder salir adelante y sobre todo poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios, ya que se encuentra estudiando la carrera técnica de prótesis dental; es por ello que se esfuerza mucho y atiende a sus clientes con mucha amabilidad.

Jose está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le ha n brindado el podrá comprar una mesa de comedor para su hogar, ya que actualmente no tiene y de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y sobre todo poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su propio consultorio dental”.
texts.en: Jose is 23 and works as a moto-taxi driver. He works about 10 hours a day as this is his only way of making money in order to make progress and, above all, to be able to cover the costs of his studies. He is currently studying a technical course on dental prosthesis. This is why he makes a lot of effort and looks after his customers in a very friendly way. Jose is grateful to Kiva lenders since, thanks to their help, he can buy a dining-room table for his home, because at the moment he hasn't got one. In this way he can improve the quality of life for his family and, most of all, he can continue to fight to make his dream a reality: to have his own dental consultancy.

loans.use: to buy a dining-room table.

loans.name: Jyan Carlos

texts.es:
Jyan vive en la ciudad de Camaná y trabaja como chófer de moto taxi desde hace varios meses, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día, ya que de este trabajo depende que pueda tener ingresos para salir adelante, es por ello que es responsable y educado con sus clientes.

Jyan está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a su vehículo y de esta manera conducirá un vehículo en mejor estado, así podrá seguir trabajando duro para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jyan lives in the city of Camaná and has been working as a mototaxi driver for several months. He works around 10 hours a day, as he depends on this work to have the income to get ahead in life. This is why he is responsible and polite with his customers.

Jyan is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have offered him, he will be able to undertake maintenance on his vehicle and in this way drive a vehicle in better condition. This will enable him to continue working hard so that he can make his greatest dream a reality: "To have my own home."

loans.use: To maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Jeimy Jimena

texts.es:
Ella es jeimy estudia en la sede campo alto, vive con la mama y las dos hermanas, en este momento se encuentra estudiando administración hotelera, no tiene los recursos necesarios para costear su carrera completa ya que vive con los hermanos y a la mama le toca muy dificl con todo. Este convenio es de mucha ayuda para ella, para que pueda cumplir sus metas y tenga un trabajo estable y a si pueda tener la facilidad de ayudarle a su mama con todos sus pagos y para entrar a la universidad y hacer la profesional.
Aunque en este momento no tiene la posibilidad de ayudarle a la mama con la mensualidad piensa hacer todo lo que este al alcance de ella para colaborar en lo que pueda. 

Gracias
texts.en:
This is Jeimy and she is studying in Campo Alto, in Bogotá.  Jeimy lives with her mother and two sisters and she is currently studying hotel management.  Jeimy does not have the finances to pay for all of her studies as she lives with her siblings and it is very difficult for her mother.  This loan would be of great help for Jeimy to achieve her goals and to have a stable job.  She will then be able to help her mother with household costs and can go on to study at university and have a profession.

Although Jeimy is currently unable to help her mother with a salary, she plans to do everything she can in order to help her.

Thank you.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for one semester.

loans.name: Fredy Antonio

texts.es: Fredy tiene 25 años de edad y se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollo de engorde desde hace mucho tiempo. Su deseo es convertirse en líder de su localidad en cuanto a la venta de pollos se trata. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de pollos de engorde y así incrementar su oferta y mejorar sus ventas y ganancias. Espera poder tener acceso a este financiamiento y proceder a hacer la compra lo antes posible.
texts.en: Fredy is 25 years old, and for a long time has been raising and selling chickens for fattening. His wish is to become a local leader when it comes to selling chickens. As indicated above, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of chickens for fattening. This will enable him to increase his supply and improve his sales and earnings. He hopes to be able to access the loan and proceed with his purchase as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy a greater quantity of chickens for fattening.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El señor Roberto es un joven trabajador, no pudo concluir el bachillerato ya que por cuestiones económicas no prosiguió con sus estudios superiores, y se vio en la necesidad de buscar trabajo y por tanto dejar de lado los estudios; es soltero y vive con sus padres, tiene gran experiencia en el rubro de la construcción civil ya que lleva más de 2 años en esta actividad; cuenta con un vehículo que es su único patrimonio. Actualmente solicita un crédito para reparar el motor de su vehículo con el cual trabaja para el traslado de sus herramientas, de esta forma podrá seguir en su actividad, y además podrá seguir colaborando a su familia con el fin de tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Roberto is a young worker. He was not able to finish high school, as for financial reasons he did pursue higher education. He found it necessary to look for work and therefore to set aside his studies. 

He is single and lives with his parents. He has considerable experience in the construction area, as he has been in this occupation for more than two years. He has a vehicle, which is his only asset. Now he is requesting a loan to repair the engine of his vehicle, which he uses for transporting his tools. This way he will be able to continue his livelihood, and continue contributing to his family, so that they can have better living conditions.

loans.use: To repair the engine of his vehicle.

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de mecanica,el socio arregla carros y motos,el socio trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de mecanica.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member, Abelardo, is still operating his auto mechanic shop, repairing cars and engines.  He works from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  He already has eight years in this business, and it is going very well.  His dream is to expand his auto repair business.  He is requesting the loan to purchase tires.  He is very grateful for the loan he has been given and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Exaltacion

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de vidrios,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de vidrios.El socio solicita el credito para comprar vidrios.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member, Exaltación,  continues with his business, selling glass.  He works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  He already has several years in this business and it is going very well.  His dream is to expand his business.  He is requesting the loan to purchase glass.  He is grateful for the loan he has been given, and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase glass.

loans.name: José Rufino

texts.es:
Don José de 44 años de edad, solamente estudió tercer grado debido a la pobreza y que sus padres no vieron importante el estudio, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene 2 hijos que viven con ellos y están estudiando, nadie mas vive con ellos. 


Él  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tiene 10 años, pues fue con sus padres que aprendió el trabajo y siempre le decía que era mejor aprender a trabajar que estudiar, además de la agricultura también es tractorista y eso lo aprendió de su papá, su día comienza a las 4:00 AM para prepararse e irse al trabajo de tractorista, donde trabaja 12 horas y regresa a las 6 de la tarde a su casa para descansar, cuando no hay trabajo con el tractor trabaja sembrando maíz y plátano.

El préstamo será utilizado, una parte para la siembra de maíz de regadío donde comprará semilla, abono y fertilizantes y la otra parte para cubrir unos gastos para el estudio de sus hijos.

Su sueño es que sus 2 hijos sean profesionales y espera que se gradúen de abogados. Con el préstamo logrará cubrir los gastos para insumos agrícolas y los gastos de estudio de sus hijos. Su sueño es dejarles un terreno a cada uno de sus hijos, además de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
José is 44 years old and only went as far as third grade in school due to poverty and the fact that his parents did not see education as important. He lives with his partner, who looks after the household chores. He has two children who live with them and are going to school; no one else lives with them. 

He has been farming for 10 years, and learned the work from his parents. They always said to him that it was better to learn to work than to go to school. 

In addition to farming, he is also a tractor operator, and learned this from his father. His day begins at 4:00 a.m. so that he can get ready and go to his tractor operator job, where he works 12 hours and returns home at 6 in the afternoon to rest. When there is no work with the tractor, he works growing corn and plantain. He will use part of the loan to grow irrigated corn, buying seed, manure and fertilizers; he will use the other part to cover some expenses for his children's education.

His dream is for his two children to be professionals, and hopes they graduate as lawyers. With the loan, he will manage to cover the expenses for agricultural supplies and the expenses for his children's education.  His dream is to leave a parcel of land to each one of his children, in addition to helping them with their university studies.

loans.use: To use one portion for growing irrigated corn, buying seed, manure and fertilizers, and the other portion to cover some expenses for his children's education.

loans.name: Jose Reynaldo

texts.es:
José, vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, posee un negocio de venta de conchas, ya cuenta con cuatro años de tenerlo, lo atiende de lunes a sábado, de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., no posee ayuda del extranjero.
Necita realizar la compra de conchas, para surtir el negocio y continuar ofreciendo productos de mejor calidad y frescos, espera que estas fechas sean de provecho para el negocio y sus ventas aumenten y así responder positivamente con sus compromisos.
Aspira a tener la posibilidad de comprar una lancha para mejorar sus economía y dar un  mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his life partner and their son. He has a business selling shellfish and has had it for four years already. He runs it from Monday to Saturday from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. He has no help from outside the country.

He needs to purchase shellfish to supply the business and continue offering the freshest, best quality products. He hopes the coming days will be beneficial for his business and that his sales increase, enabling him to meet his commitments in a positive manner.

He hopes to have the chance to buy a small boat, in order to improve his finances and give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy shellfish.

loans.name: Rocio Imery

texts.es: Rocio de 20 años de edad es madre soltera y habita junto a su hijo y sus padres en casa familiar. Rocio trabaja muy duro junto a sus padres en un pequeño taller de carpintería que han logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Rocio enjunca, barniza y atornilla. Gracias a los buenos productos que ofrecen les ha permitido ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes que cada día prefieren más sus productos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el negocio de carpintería en la compra de madera, junco, clavos, etc.
texts.en:
Rocio is 20 years old and a single mother. She lives with her son and her parents in the family home. Rocio works very hard alongside her parents, in a small carpentry workshop that they have managed to set up in their home. 

Rocio weaves cane, varnishes and assembles. Thanks to the fine products they offer, they have been able to earn the trust of many customers, who each day prefer their products more. 

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the carpentry business, through the purchase of wood, cane and nails.

loans.use: To buy wood, cane, nails, etc.

loans.name: Elsy Noemy

texts.es:
Elsy, se dispone a fortalecer su negocio de venta de tortillas, por lo que solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar maíz, cal, gas propano y bolsas, se siente satisfecha por que los créditos le dan la oportunidad de seguir trabajando con un facilidad de pagos que está a su alcance.
Con el préstamo anterior ella surtió el inventario del negocio, incremento sus ventas tiene  más clientes, ha cancelado sus deudas y mejora día a día su estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Elsy is ready to strengthen her tortilla business, so she is requesting a new loan to buy corn, lime powder, propane gas, and bags. She feels satisfied because the loans give her the opportunity to continue working with easy payments that she can afford.

With the previous loan, she stocked her inventory, increased her sales and her customer base, and paid off her debts. Her family's standard of living improves every day.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder, propane gas, and bags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy herbicides, pesticides, seed, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de escuela de choferes,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de escuela de choferes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar autopartes para carros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to operate her driving school business. She has several years in this business already, and it is going very well. 

Her dream is to expand the driving school business. She is requesting the loan to buy car parts for the cars. She is grateful for the loan granted, and promises to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: To buy car parts.

loans.name: Kevin Eliud

texts.es:
Kevin es un joven muy trabajador, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de verduras en uno de los mercados de su ciudad, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir delante.

Kevin está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas verduras para su negocio como papa, zanahoria, cebolla al por mayor, entre otros y de esta  manera poder seguir luchando para pode hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Kevin is a hardworking young man. With great effort, he was able to start his business of selling vegetables at one of the markets in his city. His business enables him to earn the income he needs to move forward.

Kevin is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to buy more vegetables for his business such as potatoes, carrots, onions, and other produce in bulk. This will allow him to continue on until he is able to fulfill his greatest wish of having a house of his own.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Nelys

texts.es:
Ella es nelis, ha escogido este técnico porque por medio de esto cree que puede sacar a su familia adelante, porque es una persona que no le ha tocado muy fácil, viene desde muy lejos buscando un futuro mejor, vive con su hermana, y a escogido a kiva porque es la manera mas fácil de poder seguir estudiando, porque se le hace muy dificil de pagar el valor mensual, porque es una chica que trabaja en un restaurante para poder pagar sus estudios y a demás de eso no cuenta con el apoyo de alguien y mucho menos económicamente, y aparte de eso es una chica huérfana de padre y madre y a pesar de todo esto sigue luchando para buscar un mejor futuro.
Quiere agradecer a kiva y a campo alto por la ayuda que le están ofreciendo porque realmente lo que ella gana no es mucho, pero le agradece a dios que le sirve para todo lo que necesita y sobre todo para poder pagar sus estudios, se siente muy agradecida por esta ayuda porque sabe que con esto va a tener un mejor futuro, no siendo mas,se despido y queda muy agradecida.
texts.en: Nelys has chosen this technical degree program because she believes that she can get her family ahead through this means.  Life hasn’t been easy for her, and she has come a long way seeking a better future.  She lives with her sister and has chosen Kiva because it is the easiest way to be able to continue studying. She works in a restaurant in order to be able to pay for her studies, but it is very difficult for her to meet the monthly payments.   In addition, she doesn’t have the support of anyone, much less financially.   Apart from this, she is an orphan, without a mother or father.  In spite of all this, however, she continues striving to find a better future.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a  semester.

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es tatiana, estudiante de enfermería en campo alto segundo semestre, en este momento esta pidiendo el favor que le colaboren para el descuento con kiva para poder seguir estudiando, ya que su sueldo no le alcanza para poder pagar una mensualidad tan costosa.
Le gustaría poder obtener el descuento con kiva porque le dan la oportunidad de seguir con los estudios y también, después de terminar de estudiar le gustaría hacer una especialización con sus estudios a qui en campo alto.
En el momento se encuentra viviendo con los dos hijos y el esposo, el cual el esposo de ella tuvo un accidente y no puede ver, y el no le puede colaborar en el momento, y tiene que trabajar para poderlos sacar adelante, ya que no cuenta con los recursos, y la familia esta lejos y ellos no tienen la capacidad económica de colaborar.
A ella le gustaría continuar con los estudios para poder obtener una carrera y poder si dios lo permite entrar a trabajar y que le paguen un poco mas del mínimo, y también para colaborar con los dos hijos para que continúen sus estudios y poder ayudar con lo que los hijos necesitan.
texts.en:
Tatiana is a nursing student in her second semester at CampoAlto.  At this time, she is requesting that you please contribute to her for the Kiva discount so that she may continue studying because her salary is not enough to cover such an expensive monthly payment.  

She would like to be able to get the discount with Kiva because it would provide her with the opportunity to continue with her studies.  In addition, after completing her studies, she would like to pursue a specialization here at CampoAlto .

At the moment, she is living with her husband and two children.  Her husband had an accident and is blind and cannot contribute right now, so she has to work in order to get ahead.  She doesn’t have any resources, and her family is far away and doesn’t have the financial ability to contribute.  

She would like to continue her studies, earn a degree and, God willing, go to work and be paid a little more than minimum wage.  She would also like to work with her two children so that they may continue their studies and be able to help them with what they need.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Santos Matilde

texts.es:
Santos, es viuda, tiene 51 años de edad, vive con una sobrina de 20 años de edad, la cual depende económicamente de ella en casa propia, tiene una tienda la cual administra desde hace ya 15 años, la apoya su sobrina, su horario de atención es de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m.
El préstamo  lo invertirá en la compra de jabón, detergentes, frijol, arroz, bebidas, golosinas, etc., lo que le ayudara a tener mejores y nuevos productos en su negocio, espera incrementar su clientela y tener mejores ganancias.
Sueña con tener un negocio más rentable y así poder cancelar sus deudas, para tener un mejor estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Santos is 51 years old and a widow. She lives in her own home, with her 20-year-old niece, who depends on her financially. She has a store which she has been running for 15 years now. Her niece helps her. The hours of the store are from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. 

She will use the loan to purchase soap, detergents, beans, rice, drinks, candy, etc., which will help her to have new and better products in her store. She hopes to increase her clientele and have better earnings. She dreams of having a more profitable business, so that she can pay off her debts and have a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: To buy soap, detergents, beans, rice, drinks, candy, etc.

loans.name: Gabina

texts.es:
La socia Gabina se sigue dedicando al negocio de limpieza y tambien cocina,la socia ya tienes varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar una cocina para su casa.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member Gabina continues working at her cleaning business and she also cooks.  She has had this business for several years now, and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a grocery store.

She is seeking a loan in order to purchase a stove for her house, and she feels grateful for the loan that she has been given; she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase a stove for her house.

loans.name: Ana Elsa

texts.es: Ana de 53 años de edad es casada y habita junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 14 años y 11 años de edad. Ana es muy trabajadora y creativa ya que hace variedad de actividades para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, además, vende variedad de joyería de enchape y granos básicos. Desea invertir en su negocio de de joyería y granos básicos ya ha notado que se demanda mucho en su comunidad. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de joyería( anillos, pulseras, aretes, cadenas, etc.) y granos básicos(arroz, maíz y frijoles) para la venta y así mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is 53 years old, married and lives with her husband and their three children, ages 18, 14 and 11. Ana is very hard-working and creative, as she does a variety of activities in order to earn a living and support her household. 

She makes articles of clothing and also sells a variety of plated jewelry, as well as basic staples. She wishes to invest in her jewelry and basic staples businesses, as she has noted that there is considerable demand in her community. 

As indicated above, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of jewelry (rings, bracelets, earrings, chains, etc.), and basic staples (rice, corn and beans) to sell. This will allow her to improve her income, and consequently her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy jewelry (rings, bracelets, earrings, chains, etc.) And basic staples (rice, corn and beans).

loans.name: Maria Elida

texts.es:
María, se dedica a atender la tienda de donde obtiene los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos familiares, ella es madre soltera de una niña, dicho negocio ya tiene 7 años de poseerlo y no le representa ningún problema su administración.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar bebidas, golosinas, pan, pollo, embutidos, aderezos, entre otra clase de productos que sus clientes necesitan, en esta temporada de fin de año ella espera tener mejores ingresos con los que podrá cumplir con sus compromisos familiares.
Sueña con tener un negocio mucho más grande para contar con la satisfacción de sus clientes y de esa manera tener una economía más estable.
texts.en:
María runs the store where she earns the income necessary to cover her family expenses. She is a single mother of a young girl and has had her business for 7 years with no problems running it.

The loan is needed to buy drinks, candies, bread, chicken, meats, dressings and other products that her customers need. In this end of the year time she hopes to have higher incomes with which she will be able to cover her family commitments. 

She dreams of having a much bigger business to satisfy her customers and in this way have a more stable economic situation.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candies, bread, chicken, meats, dressings and other products.

loans.name: Gliber Sabino

texts.es:
Gliber es un hombre muy trabajador, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes, golosinas, y bebidas como gaseosas y cervezas; con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder sacar adelante a su familia.

Gliber está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le ha  brindado el podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como golosinas al por mayor y también poder comprar una vitrina para su negocio para poder exhibir sus productos de mejor manera a sus clientes, mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener un minimarket”.
texts.en:
Gliber is a very hardworking man. He managed to initiate his own business through a great deal of effort. He sells groceries, candies and beverages such as soda and beer. He uses the income from this business to get his family ahead.

Gliber is very grateful to Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help they have provided, he will be able to purchase merchandise for his business such as candies in bulk and a display case for the business, which he will use to improve the way he displays products to his customers. This will increase his income and help him continue working to realize his dream of "having a mini market".

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and a display case for his business.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es: Toribia de 55 años es casada con 04 hijos independientes, ella pertenece al grupo “Los Girasoles” conformada por 08 socios empeñosos y responsables. Toribia se dedica a la venta de menudencias de pollo y lo realiza en un mercado de su localidad. Con su perseverancia y dedicación a podido apoyar a sus hijos en su educación y mejorar su vivienda. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de menudencias de pollo. El deseo de Toribia es de tener su propio puesto ya que por el momento solo lo alquila. El grupo “Los Girasoles” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Toribia es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste chompa negra.
texts.en:
Toribia, 55 years old, is married with four adult children. She belongs to Los Girasoles Communal Bank, which is composed of eight diligent and responsible members. She makes a living selling chicken giblets at a market in the area.  With her perseverance and dedication she has been able to support her children’s education and improve her house.  Her recent loan will be used to purchase chicken giblets. Toribia’s wish is to have her own stall because at the moment she rents one.

The members of Los Girasoles group are grateful to the people who made this loan possible and are committed to continuing to work hard.

Toriba is the second on the left wearing a black top.

loans.use: to purchase chicken giblets.

loans.name: Brenda Isabel

texts.es: Brenda de 22 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad. Brenda trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace un año y de esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta de uno de los cuartos de su vivienda y para cambiar las láminas del corredor las cuales se encuentran deterioradas, por lo que comprará lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: Brenda, 22, lives in her own home with her partner and their small daughter, 3 years old. Brenda has been working as a domestic employee for one year and it allows her to earn a living and help with the household expenses. She wants to improve her living conditions, which is why she asks FUSAI for money to buy a door for one of the rooms in her home, and to change the tin sheeting in the hallway which has deteriorated. She will buy galvanized tin sheeting, wood and nails.

loans.use: to buy a door, galvanized tin sheeting, wood and nails.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa mayor de edad madre soltera con una hija mayor de edad, originaria del municipio de chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora con muchos deseos de superación personal, Teresa es una microempresaria que se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como:ropa de niños, cosméticos, zapatos, pantalones, prendas de oro, plata y bronce, perfumenes, cremas, ropa interior productos plásticos entre otros, sus compras las realiza en otro país, los cuales después los distribuye en centros de trabajos y comerciante de chinandega, los cuales tiene clientes fijos y eventuales da crédito y al contado los cuales recupera semanal y quincenal, negocio el cual lo desempeña de forma ambulante inicia su jornada diaria desde muy temprano para recorrer todos los lugares de chinandega para entregar sus productos, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra de mercadería como:variedades estilos de ropa para niños y adultos, cosméticos, productos plásticos entre otros, y de esa manera obtener mejores ingresos para su hogar, Teresa agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les brindan a personas de bajos recursos económicos a países pobres como es Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Teresa is a single mother of a grown daughter. She is from the town of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. She is known for being hardworking and dedicated, with a lot of desire for personal improvement. She is a small businesswoman, selling merchandise door-to-door like children's clothing, cosmetics, shoes, pants, gold, silver and bronze goods, perfumes, creams, underwear, and plastic products, among other things. She makes her purchases in another country and distributes them in business centers and merchants in Chinandega, where she has fixed and occasional clientele. She sells in cash or on credit, which she collects weekly or bimonthly. She starts her day very early to run all over Chinandega delivering her products.

The goal of this loan is to invest in business capital and stock her store by purchasing merchandise such as: various styles of clothing for children and adults, cosmetics, plastic goods and other things. This way she can make more money for her home. Teresa is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders give to people of scarce economic resources in poor countries like Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as various styles of clothing, shoes, cosmetics, plastic products and other things.

loans.name: Juan Alexander

texts.es: Juan Alexander, mayor de edad soltero, originario del municipio de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, zona donde predomina el comercio, turismo, sus playas, es un microempresario que se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como: ropa, zapatos, perfumenes, cosméticos, telas, adornos, chinerias, productos plásticos entre otros mas, sus compras las realiza en otros municipios del país al por mayor, los cuales son al contado, sus ventas son al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales los cuales desde muy temprano comienza sus jornadas de trabajo de forma ambulante en diferentes barrios y municipios de chinandega, el financiamiento de este nuevo crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo incrementando su inventario y así aprovechar las ventas en este mes que son mayores por aproximarse las fiestas navideñas, los cuales ya tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes. Juan agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les brindan a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Juan Alexander is single and lives in Chinandega in the western part of the country, an area known for commerce, tourism, and its beaches. He is a small business owner who sells general merchandise like clothing, shoes, perfumes, cosmetics, fabrics, decorations, knick knacks, plastic goods and other things. He makes his purchases in bulk in other towns, in cash. He sells for cash or credit to fixed and occasional customers. He starts his work day very early, walking around various neighborhoods and towns in Chinandega.

This new loan will be used to increase his inventory and take advantage of the sales this month, which are higher because the Christmas season is coming. He already has several orders from his customers. Juan is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders give to people of low economic resources.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like shoes, cosmetics, clothing, fabric, decorations, plastic products and other things.

loans.name: Los Girasoles De Compone Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS GIRASOLES DE COMPONE”; Este banco se ubica en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Norma; ella es conviviente, tiene 24 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y alimentos para su negocio.
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de ganados, venta de leche, crianza de animales menores, ganadería, venta de productos lácteos, agricultura, obrero maestro constructor.
 Las personas que salen con la cara tapada no pertenecen al banco comunal.
 La foto fue tomada en dos grupos y algunos de forma individual por motivos de trabajo y salud esperemos que para el siguiente desembolso se tome en un solo grupo.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Norma is a member of the communal bank Los Girasoles de Compone (The Sunflowers of Compone). This group is located in the Anta district, in the Anta province, department of Cusco. 

Norma is common law married. She’s 24 years old and has a son. She alternates her daily activities with raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens. She’s been in this business for some time, and it’s going well thanks to the work she puts in every day. She raises these animals for later resale to clients who order them. She’d like to be able to continue this work to support her family. 

She’s asking for a loan to buy guinea pigs and feed for her business. 

The other members work selling cattle, selling milk, raising small animals, raising livestock, selling dairy products, farming and doing construction work. The people in the photo who have their faces covered aren’t in the communal bank. The photo was taken of the bank split into two groups along with some other individuals. Hopefully the next photo will be taken of one group. 

Norma thanks all those who share in her dream through this means and commits to make her installment payments according to the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and feed for her business.

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es: El es juan camilo, estudia cocina, esta en primer semestre, gracias a muchos esfuerzos y responsabilidades lo culmino y paso a segundo semestre, por lo tanto pide la colaboración de kiva para seguir adelante  con la carrera y poderla culminar completamente hasta el final, ya que se encuentra trabajando informalmente, pero en el cual gana lo necesario para los gastos, y el cual le deja parte para el estudio, pero como no le alcanza completo por eso pide la colaboración y pronta respuesta para poder inscribirse al segundo semestre y seguir aprendiendo y avanzando cada clase para ser el mejor y mejorar la calidad de vida, tener un campo de alto estudio y rendimiento en la carrera para superar obstáculos y cada día escalar lo mas alto para ganar las metas y logros.
texts.en: This is Juan Camilo.  He is a first semester student studying cooking.  Thanks to a lot of work and responsibility he finished and passed on to second semester, which is why he requests help from Kiva to keep advancing in the program and be able to finish it completely.  At this time he is working informally, earning enough to cover his expenses and part of the cost of his education.  However, since he doesn't make enough to pay the whole cost he requests help and a prompt response so he can enroll in the second semester and continue learning and advancing in each class.  He wants to be the best and improve his quality of life, have a degree, and see results for his career so he can overcome obstacles, and do his best every day so he can reach his goals and succeed.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa de 68 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas mayores de edad y su pequeña nieta de 9 años de edad. Tomasa trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace mucho tiempo. Dicho oficio le ha permitido ganarse el sustento diario y mantener la economía del hogar dado que su esposo falleció y ella se quedó a cargo del hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción del corredor de la vivienda por lo que necesita comprar: lámina galvanizada, polines y pines par comenzar a construir e corredor lo antes posible.
texts.en: Tomasa is 68 years old. She lives in her own home along with her two grown daughters and her young 9 year old granddaughter. Tomasa has worked as a maid for several years. This job has allowed her to earn enough for daily costs and to meet household expenses since her husband died and she was left in charge of the house. She’s asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a hallway in her house. She needs to buy galvanized metal sheeting, support beams, and pins to be able to begin building the hallway as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, support beams, and pins to build a hallway in her home.

loans.name: Angie Paola

texts.es:
Ella es angie paola, y el sueño de ella es estudiar medicina forense por lo cual inicio estudiando auxiliar de enfermería en campo alto, piensa que es un escalón fuerte para ir haciendo realidad el sueño, lastimosamente no tiene la plata suficiente para costearse toda la carrera, pues los padres solo ganan el salario mínimo y tienen que pagar arriendo, servicios y demás. Posterior a eso, tiene una hermana pequeña entonces los ingresos no alcanzan, por eso necesita la ayuda, para poder hacer el sueño de ella realidad, la ventaja es que a pesar de la edad tiene gran conocimiento sobre la medicina y le encanta, es algo por lo que lucha y quiere hacerlo realidad, es buena estudiante, cumple lo que promete, es muy cumplida y juiciosa.
Agradece enormemente el apoyo y colaboración ya que con este aporte de que el sueño se hace realidad sale adelante profesionalmente y laboral mente.
texts.en: This is Angie Paola. Her dream is to study forensic medicine, and so she’s begun by studying nursing at CampoAlto. She believes this is a good step towards fulfilling her dream. Unfortunately she doesn’t have the money she needs to pay for the entire degree since her parents earn only a minimum wage and they have rent, utilities, and other bills. She also has a little sister so their income isn’t enough. So, she needs help to realize her dream. The upside is that, despite her age, she knows a lot about medicine and loves it. This is what she’s working towards and wants to make a reality. She’s a good student, she does what she says, she’s very nice and smart. She’s extremely thankful since, with this help, she can make her dream a reality and move forward in her profession.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: Jose Ángel mayor de edad casado con dos hijos uno aun bajo su responsabilidad, originario de uno de los municipios de chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable, con muchos deseos de superación personal, Jose es un microempresario el cual posee varios negocios como:venta de lotería rifero en uno de los mercados de esa localidad, también se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general por encargos como: ropa, productos plásticos, cosméticos, bordados, tejidos entre otros, sus compras las realiza al contado en mercados de mayoreos y sus ventas son al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales los cuales recupera semanal y quincenalmente lo invertido, negocio el cual lo inicia con capital propio buscando un medio digno de sobrevivir y el de sacar adelante a sus hijos, el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo como: cosméticos, ropa, entre otros y lograr cubrir con pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
Jose Ángel is married and has two dependent children. He is from one of the towns near Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. He is known for being hardworking, responsible and with a great desire for personal improvement. Jose is a small businessman, with several businesses like selling lottery tickets in one of the markets, and selling general merchandise by order such as clothing, plastic goods, cosmetics, embroidery, knit goods and other things. He makes his purchases in the wholesale markets and he sells for cash or credit to both fixed and occasional clientele. He collects payments weekly or bimonthly. He started his business with his own capital, looking for an honest way to survive and take care of his children.

The goal of this loan is to invest in business capital like cosmetics, clothing and other things to cover the orders that he has.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like clothing, plastic goods, cosmetics and other things.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La señora Margarita vive en la población de Entre Ríos, junto a su hijo, es viuda y tomo la desicion de cambiar de lugar de residencia yendose al trópico para conseguir trabajo y salir adelantesola saco adelante a su familia, . Se dedica al comercio de venta de abarrotes en una tienda de barrio, es muy dedicada a su actividad y tiene una tienda en la que vive y ahí también realiza sus ventas, su negocio es familiar por ello recibe la ayuda de sus hijos, pero también contrata una persona eventual para que le colabore con las ventas de refrescos, como quiere seguir mejorando, solicita un crédito para ampliacion de vivienda de forma que pueda acomodar mejor la tienda y logre ofrecer un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Señora Margarita lives in the town of Entre Ríos, along with her son. She is a widow, and she made the decision to change her place of residence, moving to the tropical zone in order to find work and move forward. She has raised her family on her own.

She sells groceries in a neighborhood store and she is very dedicated to her occupation, having a shop in which she lives and also makes her sales.  Hers is a family business, so she has the help of her sons, but she also employs a person part-time to help her with selling soft drinks. 

Because she wants to continue improving, she is seeking a loan in order to enlarge her home so that she can accommodate the store better, and be able to offer better service.

loans.use: to enlarge her home.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier (pictured with his wife)  es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

Me llamo Javier, tengo 55 años, estoy casado y tengo dos hijos, aunque solo uno depende de mi. Me dedico al comercio desde hace 40 años, inicie como chalan en un puesto de tacos, al principio yo limpiaba los platos. Después me case y decidí poner mi propio negocio donde vendo tacos de cabeza, mi esposa trabaja conmigo. Las ventas sonn buenas porqué estamos en una calle transitada.

Estoy pidiendo el prestamo para hacer más grande mi negocio y poder meter otros productos como tacos de suadero, longaniza y tripa. Mi lema, es "los tacos más baratos del rumbo y con buen sabor". Me consideró muy trabajador, responsable y comprometido.  Mis principales logros son haber sacado adelante a mi familia, mantener un negocio y construir una casa.
texts.en:
Javier (pictured with his wife) is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is his story. 

My name is Javier. I am 55 years old and married. I have two children but only one is dependent on me. I have been dedicated to business for 40 years. I started as an attendant at a taco stand. At first, I was washing the dishes. Later, I got married and decided to start my own business where I sell head tacos. My wife works with me. The sales are good because we are a busy street. 

I am requesting a loan in order to make my business bigger and to be able to offer more products like sweaty tacos, longaniza tacos and tripe tacos. My motto, is "The cheap tacos are good tasting". I consider myself very-hardworking, responsible and committed. My main achievements are to move my family forward, maintain a business and build a house.

loans.use: expand his food stand and buy more products.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz termino de pagar su primer crédito en el mes de diciembre, realizando todos los pagos puntualmente. Ella uso el dinero para hacer mejoras en su negocio, compras sillas y mejorar un poco la imagen del negocio. Afortunadamente todo va muy bien y sigue teniendo muchos clientes. Esta vez esta pidiendo el crédito para hacer mejoras en su hogar.
texts.en: Beatriz finished paying her first loan in December, making all of her payments on time. She used the money to make improvements to her business by buy seats and improve the image of her business a little. Fortunately, everything is going well and she continues to have a lot of customers. This time, she is requesting a loan to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: improve her home.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kulsoom is a 46-year-old married woman living with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son drives a van which does not belong to him; he has to pay a daily fare to the van owner. A few days ago he was in a road accident while driving and the van was seriously damaged. The van owner is imposing a penalty on him which is out of his earning capacity. He wants to repair the van so that he can compensate the damages.

Therefore, Kulsoom has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan which is the field partner of Kiva. Kulsoom hopes that through this amount her son will be able to repair the van and drive it again smoothly. Kulsoom belongs to a poor family, her son is the only single earning person and does not have any other source of income. Kulsoom seems very glad; she thanks Kiva and the field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to fix the passenger van used by her son.

loans.name: La Masheñita De Paxot Group

texts.es:
La señora Rafaela es de estado civil solteta. Tiene 22 años de edad. No tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar. Se dedica al comercio de ropa tipica. Inició este negocio con la ayuda de su madre y a la fecha lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstampo que lo utilizará para la compra de mercadería, específicamente Guipiles típicos. Desea en el futuro contar con un capital propio y ofrecer guipiles de diferentes estilos y colores.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la artesanía y al comercio. 

Las integrantes del grupo son 11 personas, pero, una de ellas no pudo asistir cuando tomaron la foto.
texts.en:
Rafaela is 22 years old and single. She did not have the chance to go to school. She sells traditional clothing. She started this business with her mother's help, and so far has two years of experience.

She is organizing a group and requesting a loan, which she will use to buy merchandise; specifically, traditional embroidered blouses. In the future she wishes to have her own working capital and offer embroidered blouses in different styles and colors.

The other members of the group do handicrafts and have small businesses.

There are 11 members of the group, but one of them was not able to attend when the photo was taken.

loans.use: To buy traditional embroidered blouses.

loans.name: Wilson Arley

texts.es:
Wilson es un hombre trabajador de 39 años de edad, reconocido por ser servicial y amable. Durante 20 años ha trabajado en el sector transporte, inicialmente como empleado, conduciendo camiones de carga, donde conoció la labor y obtuvo experiencia en el manejo de la actividad; esto lo impulsó a tomar la decisión de independizarse y fue así, como adquirió su propio camión, hace 8 años, en el que presta el servicio de transporte de mercancías, productos agropecuarios, animales, hace acarreos, lleva materiales de construcción y todo tipo de mercancía según el requerimiento de sus clientes; se ubica en un acopio en el que llega el cliente y lo contrata, además tiene la ventaja de poseer clientes fijos que le solicitan el servicio con una simple llamada al celular; así es como Wilson se gana la vida, aun cuando tiene que enfrentarse a un sector en el que se presenta mucha competencia desleal.
El crédito que solicita es para realizar el mantenimiento del camión y hacer la reparación del motor; lo que le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y continuar con la prestación de sus servicios, para seguir generando recursos para el sustento diario.
Wilson, como todo ser humano tiene sueños y aspiraciones en la vida; el principal es acreditar y fortalecer más su negocio y, en un futuro a mediano plazo desea estar en la capacidad de incrementar su parque automotor, con más camiones para tener mejor rentabilidad y poder disfrutar mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Wilson, age 39, is a hardworking man who is known for being helpful and friendly. During the 20 years he has worked in the transportation sector, Wilson started out as an employee who drove cargo trucks. He became known for his work and gained driving experience in this position. This eventually led to his decision to become independent and acquire his own truck eight years ago. Wilson provides transport services for all types of goods, including agricultural products and animals. He also hauls construction materials and all other types of merchandise according to the requirements of his customers. His business is located at a depot where his customers can come and contact him. In addition, he has the advantage of established customers who request his services simply by calling him on his mobile phone. Even though Wilson works in a sector in which there is a great deal of unfair competition, this is how he earns his living.

The loan he is requesting will be used to maintain his truck and make repairs to the engine. This will provide better working conditions so that he can continue offering his services. As a result, he can continue generating income for his daily needs.

Wilson is like anyone else who has dreams and aspirations in life. His main goal is to establish and strengthen his business. Sometime in the future, he wants to have the ability to increase his fleet of vehicles by adding more trucks. This will result in greater profitability and better living conditions that he can enjoy.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance and engine repairs on his truck.

loans.name: Georgina
